7311 
7322 function dol_htmlentities($string, $flags = ENT_QUOTES|ENT_SUBSTITUTE, $encoding = 'UTF-8', $double_encode = false)
7323 {
7324  return htmlentities($string, $flags, $encoding, $double_encode);
7325 }
7326 
7336 function dol_string_is_good_iso($s, $clean = 0)
7337 {
7338  $len = dol_strlen($s);
7339  $out = '';
7340  $ok = 1;
7341  for ($scursor = 0; $scursor < $len; $scursor++) {
7342  $ordchar = ord($s[$scursor]);
7343  //print $scursor.'-'.$ordchar.'<br>';
7344  if ($ordchar < 32 && $ordchar != 13 && $ordchar != 10) {
7345  $ok = 0;
7346  break;
7347  } elseif ($ordchar > 126 && $ordchar < 160) {
7348  $ok = 0;
7349  break;
7350  } elseif ($clean) {
7351  $out .= $s[$scursor];
7352  }
7353  }
7354  if ($clean) {
7355  return $out;
7356  }
7357  return $ok;
7358 }
7359 
7368 function dol_nboflines($s, $maxchar = 0)
7369 {
7370  if ($s == '') {
7371  return 0;
7372  }
7373  $arraystring = explode("\n", $s);
7374  $nb = count($arraystring);
7375 
7376  return $nb;
7377 }
7378 
7379 
7389 function dol_nboflines_bis($text, $maxlinesize = 0, $charset = 'UTF-8')
7390 {
7391  $repTable = array("\t" => " ", "\n" => "<br>", "\r" => " ", "\0" => " ", "\x0B" => " ");
7392  if (dol_textishtml($text)) {
7393  $repTable = array("\t" => " ", "\n" => " ", "\r" => " ", "\0" => " ", "\x0B" => " ");
7394  }
7395 
7396  $text = strtr($text, $repTable);
7397  if ($charset == 'UTF-8') {
7398  $pattern = '/(<br[^>]*>)/Uu';
7399  } else {
7400  // /U is to have UNGREEDY regex to limit to one html tag. /u is for UTF8 support
7401  $pattern = '/(<br[^>]*>)/U'; // /U is to have UNGREEDY regex to limit to one html tag.
7402  }
7403  $a = preg_split($pattern, $text, -1, PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE | PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY);
7404 
7405  $nblines = (int) floor((count($a) + 1) / 2);
7406  // count possible auto line breaks
7407  if ($maxlinesize) {
7408  foreach ($a as $line) {
7409  if (dol_strlen($line) > $maxlinesize) {
7410  //$line_dec = html_entity_decode(strip_tags($line));
7411  $line_dec = html_entity_decode($line);
7412  if (dol_strlen($line_dec) > $maxlinesize) {
7413  $line_dec = wordwrap($line_dec, $maxlinesize, '\n', true);
7414  $nblines += substr_count($line_dec, '\n');
7415  }
7416  }
7417  }
7418  }
7419 
7420  unset($a);
7421  return $nblines;
7422 }
7423 
7432 function dol_textishtml($msg, $option = 0)
7433 {
7434  if (is_null($msg)) {
7435  return false;
7436  }
7437 
7438  if ($option == 1) {
7439  if (preg_match('/<html/i', $msg)) {
7440  return true;
7441  } elseif (preg_match('/<body/i', $msg)) {
7442  return true;
7443  } elseif (preg_match('/<\/textarea/i', $msg)) {
7444  return true;
7445  } elseif (preg_match('/<(b|em|i|u)>/i', $msg)) {
7446  return true;
7447  } elseif (preg_match('/<br/i', $msg)) {
7448  return true;
7449  }
7450  return false;
7451  } else {
7452  // Remove all urls because 'http://aa?param1=abc&amp;param2=def' must not be used inside detection
7453  $msg = preg_replace('/https?:\/\/[^"\'\s]+/i', '', $msg);
7454  if (preg_match('/<html/i', $msg)) {
7455  return true;
7456  } elseif (preg_match('/<body/i', $msg)) {
7457  return true;
7458  } elseif (preg_match('/<\/textarea/i', $msg)) {
7459  return true;
7460  } elseif (preg_match('/<(b|em|i|u)>/i', $msg)) {
7461  return true;
7462  } elseif (preg_match('/<br\/>/i', $msg)) {
7463  return true;
7464  } elseif (preg_match('/<(br|div|font|li|p|span|strong|table)>/i', $msg)) {
7465  return true;
7466  } elseif (preg_match('/<(br|div|font|li|p|span|strong|table)\s+[^<>\/]*\/?>/i', $msg)) {
7467  return true;
7468  } elseif (preg_match('/<img\s+[^<>]*src[^<>]*>/i', $msg)) {
7469  return true; // must accept <img src="http://example.com/aaa.png" />
7470  } elseif (preg_match('/<a\s+[^<>]*href[^<>]*>/i', $msg)) {
7471  return true; // must accept <a href="http://example.com/aaa.png" />
7472  } elseif (preg_match('/<h[0-9]>/i', $msg)) {
7473  return true;
7474  } elseif (preg_match('/&[A-Z0-9]{1,6};/i', $msg)) {
7475  // TODO If content is 'A link https://aaa?param=abc&amp;param2=def', it return true but must be false
7476  return true; // Html entities names (http://www.w3schools.com/tags/ref_entities.asp)
7477  } elseif (preg_match('/&#[0-9]{2,3};/i', $msg)) {
7478  return true; // Html entities numbers (http://www.w3schools.com/tags/ref_entities.asp)
7479  }
7480 
7481  return false;
7482  }
7483 }
7484 
7499 function dol_concatdesc($text1, $text2, $forxml = false, $invert = false)
7500 {
7501  if (!empty($invert)) {
7502  $tmp = $text1;
7503  $text1 = $text2;
7504  $text2 = $tmp;
7505  }
7506 
7507  $ret = '';
7508  $ret .= (!dol_textishtml($text1) && dol_textishtml($text2)) ? dol_nl2br(dol_escape_htmltag($text1, 0, 1, '', 1), 0, $forxml) : $text1;
7509  $ret .= (!empty($text1) && !empty($text2)) ? ((dol_textishtml($text1) || dol_textishtml($text2)) ? ($forxml ? "<br >\n" : "<br>\n") : "\n") : "";
7510  $ret .= (dol_textishtml($text1) && !dol_textishtml($text2)) ? dol_nl2br(dol_escape_htmltag($text2, 0, 1, '', 1), 0, $forxml) : $text2;
7511  return $ret;
7512 }
7513 
7514 
7515 
7526 function getCommonSubstitutionArray($outputlangs, $onlykey = 0, $exclude = null, $object = null)
7527 {
7528  global $db, $conf, $mysoc, $user, $extrafields;
7529 
7530  $substitutionarray = array();
7531 
7532  if (empty($exclude) || !in_array('user', $exclude)) {
7533  // Add SIGNATURE into substitutionarray first, so, when we will make the substitution,
7534  // this will include signature content first and then replace var found into content of signature
7535  //var_dump($onlykey);
7536  $emailsendersignature = $user->signature; // dy default, we use the signature of current user. We must complete substitution with signature in c_email_senderprofile of array after calling getCommonSubstitutionArray()
7537  $usersignature = $user->signature;
7538  $substitutionarray = array_merge($substitutionarray, array(
7539  '__SENDEREMAIL_SIGNATURE__' => (string) ((empty($conf->global->MAIN_MAIL_DO_NOT_USE_SIGN)) ? ($onlykey == 2 ? dol_trunc('SignatureFromTheSelectedSenderProfile', 30) : $emailsendersignature) : ''),
7540  '__USER_SIGNATURE__' => (string) (($usersignature && empty($conf->global->MAIN_MAIL_DO_NOT_USE_SIGN)) ? ($onlykey == 2 ? dol_trunc(dol_string_nohtmltag($usersignature), 30) : $usersignature) : '')
7541  ));
7542 
7543  if (is_object($user)) {
7544  $substitutionarray = array_merge($substitutionarray, array(
7545  '__USER_ID__' => (string) $user->id,
7546  '__USER_LOGIN__' => (string) $user->login,
7547  '__USER_EMAIL__' => (string) $user->email,
7548  '__USER_PHONE__' => (string) dol_print_phone($user->office_phone),
7549  '__USER_PHONEPRO__' => (string) dol_print_phone($user->user_mobile),
7550  '__USER_PHONEMOBILE__' => (string) dol_print_phone($user->personal_mobile),
7551  '__USER_FAX__' => (string) $user->office_fax,
7552  '__USER_LASTNAME__' => (string) $user->lastname,
7553  '__USER_FIRSTNAME__' => (string) $user->firstname,
7554  '__USER_FULLNAME__' => (string) $user->getFullName($outputlangs),
7555  '__USER_SUPERVISOR_ID__' => (string) ($user->fk_user ? $user->fk_user : '0'),
7556  '__USER_JOB__' => (string) $user->job,
7557  '__USER_REMOTE_IP__' => (string) getUserRemoteIP()
7558  ));
7559  }
7560  }
7561  if ((empty($exclude) || !in_array('mycompany', $exclude)) && is_object($mysoc)) {
7562  $substitutionarray = array_merge($substitutionarray, array(
7563  '__MYCOMPANY_NAME__' => $mysoc->name,
7564  '__MYCOMPANY_EMAIL__' => $mysoc->email,
7565  '__MYCOMPANY_PHONE__' => dol_print_phone($mysoc->phone),
7566  '__MYCOMPANY_FAX__' => dol_print_phone($mysoc->fax),
7567  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID1__' => $mysoc->idprof1,
7568  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID2__' => $mysoc->idprof2,
7569  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID3__' => $mysoc->idprof3,
7570  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID4__' => $mysoc->idprof4,
7571  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID5__' => $mysoc->idprof5,
7572  '__MYCOMPANY_PROFID6__' => $mysoc->idprof6,
7573  '__MYCOMPANY_CAPITAL__' => $mysoc->capital,
7574  '__MYCOMPANY_FULLADDRESS__' => (method_exists($mysoc, 'getFullAddress') ? $mysoc->getFullAddress(1, ', ') : ''), // $mysoc may be stdClass
7575  '__MYCOMPANY_ADDRESS__' => $mysoc->address,
7576  '__MYCOMPANY_ZIP__' => $mysoc->zip,
7577  '__MYCOMPANY_TOWN__' => $mysoc->town,
7578  '__MYCOMPANY_COUNTRY__' => $mysoc->country,
7579  '__MYCOMPANY_COUNTRY_ID__' => $mysoc->country_id,
7580  '__MYCOMPANY_COUNTRY_CODE__' => $mysoc->country_code,
7581  '__MYCOMPANY_CURRENCY_CODE__' => $conf->currency
7582  ));
7583  }
7584 
7585  if (($onlykey || is_object($object)) && (empty($exclude) || !in_array('object', $exclude))) {
7586  if ($onlykey) {
7587  $substitutionarray['__ID__'] = '__ID__';
7588  $substitutionarray['__REF__'] = '__REF__';
7589  $substitutionarray['__NEWREF__'] = '__NEWREF__';
7590  $substitutionarray['__LABEL__'] = '__LABEL__';
7591  $substitutionarray['__REF_CLIENT__'] = '__REF_CLIENT__';
7592  $substitutionarray['__REF_SUPPLIER__'] = '__REF_SUPPLIER__';
7593  $substitutionarray['__NOTE_PUBLIC__'] = '__NOTE_PUBLIC__';
7594  $substitutionarray['__NOTE_PRIVATE__'] = '__NOTE_PRIVATE__';
7595  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_XXX__'] = '__EXTRAFIELD_XXX__';
7596 
7597  if (isModEnabled("societe")) { // Most objects are concerned
7598  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ID__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_ID__';
7599  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_NAME__';
7600  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME_ALIAS__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_NAME_ALIAS__';
7601  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_CODE_CLIENT__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_CODE_CLIENT__';
7602  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_CODE_FOURNISSEUR__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_CODE_FOURNISSEUR__';
7603  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_EMAIL__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_EMAIL__';
7604  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_PHONE__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_PHONE__';
7605  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_FAX__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_FAX__';
7606  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ADDRESS__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_ADDRESS__';
7607  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ZIP__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_ZIP__';
7608  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_TOWN__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_TOWN__';
7609  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF1__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF1__';
7610  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF2__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF2__';
7611  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF3__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF3__';
7612  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF4__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF4__';
7613  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF5__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF5__';
7614  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF6__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF6__';
7615  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_TVAINTRA__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_TVAINTRA__';
7616  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PUBLIC__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PUBLIC__';
7617  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PRIVATE__'] = '__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PRIVATE__';
7618  }
7619  if (isModEnabled('adherent') && (!is_object($object) || $object->element == 'adherent')) {
7620  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_ID__'] = '__MEMBER_ID__';
7621  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_CIVILITY__'] = '__MEMBER_CIVILITY__';
7622  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FIRSTNAME__'] = '__MEMBER_FIRSTNAME__';
7623  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LASTNAME__'] = '__MEMBER_LASTNAME__';
7624  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_USER_LOGIN_INFORMATION__'] = 'Login and pass of the external user account';
7625  /*$substitutionarray['__MEMBER_NOTE_PUBLIC__'] = '__MEMBER_NOTE_PUBLIC__';
7626  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_NOTE_PRIVATE__'] = '__MEMBER_NOTE_PRIVATE__';*/
7627  }
7628  // add variables subtitutions ticket
7629  if (isModEnabled('ticket') && (!is_object($object) || $object->element == 'ticket')) {
7630  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_TRACKID__'] = '__TICKET_TRACKID__';
7631  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_SUBJECT__'] = '__TICKET_SUBJECT__';
7632  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_TYPE__'] = '__TICKET_TYPE__';
7633  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_SEVERITY__'] = '__TICKET_SEVERITY__';
7634  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_CATEGORY__'] = '__TICKET_CATEGORY__';
7635  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_ANALYTIC_CODE__'] = '__TICKET_ANALYTIC_CODE__';
7636  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_MESSAGE__'] = '__TICKET_MESSAGE__';
7637  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_PROGRESSION__'] = '__TICKET_PROGRESSION__';
7638  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_USER_ASSIGN__'] = '__TICKET_USER_ASSIGN__';
7639  }
7640 
7641  if (isModEnabled('recruitment') && (!is_object($object) || $object->element == 'recruitmentcandidature')) {
7642  $substitutionarray['__CANDIDATE_FULLNAME__'] = '__CANDIDATE_FULLNAME__';
7643  $substitutionarray['__CANDIDATE_FIRSTNAME__'] = '__CANDIDATE_FIRSTNAME__';
7644  $substitutionarray['__CANDIDATE_LASTNAME__'] = '__CANDIDATE_LASTNAME__';
7645  }
7646  if (isModEnabled('project')) { // Most objects
7647  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_ID__'] = '__PROJECT_ID__';
7648  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_REF__'] = '__PROJECT_REF__';
7649  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_NAME__'] = '__PROJECT_NAME__';
7650  /*$substitutionarray['__PROJECT_NOTE_PUBLIC__'] = '__PROJECT_NOTE_PUBLIC__';
7651  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_NOTE_PRIVATE__'] = '__PROJECT_NOTE_PRIVATE__';*/
7652  }
7653  if (isModEnabled('contrat') && (!is_object($object) || $object->element == 'contract')) {
7654  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_HIGHEST_PLANNED_START_DATE__'] = 'Highest date planned for a service start';
7655  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_HIGHEST_PLANNED_START_DATETIME__'] = 'Highest date and hour planned for service start';
7656  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_LOWEST_EXPIRATION_DATE__'] = 'Lowest data for planned expiration of service';
7657  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_LOWEST_EXPIRATION_DATETIME__'] = 'Lowest date and hour for planned expiration of service';
7658  }
7659  if (isModEnabled("propal") && (!is_object($object) || $object->element == 'propal')) {
7660  $substitutionarray['__ONLINE_SIGN_URL__'] = 'ToOfferALinkForOnlineSignature';
7661  }
7662  $substitutionarray['__ONLINE_PAYMENT_URL__'] = 'UrlToPayOnlineIfApplicable';
7663  $substitutionarray['__ONLINE_PAYMENT_TEXT_AND_URL__'] = 'TextAndUrlToPayOnlineIfApplicable';
7664  $substitutionarray['__SECUREKEYPAYMENT__'] = 'Security key (if key is not unique per record)';
7665  $substitutionarray['__SECUREKEYPAYMENT_MEMBER__'] = 'Security key for payment on a member subscription (one key per member)';
7666  $substitutionarray['__SECUREKEYPAYMENT_ORDER__'] = 'Security key for payment on an order';
7667  $substitutionarray['__SECUREKEYPAYMENT_INVOICE__'] = 'Security key for payment on an invoice';
7668  $substitutionarray['__SECUREKEYPAYMENT_CONTRACTLINE__'] = 'Security key for payment on a service of a contract';
7669 
7670  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_PROPOSAL__'] = 'Direct download url of a proposal';
7671  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_ORDER__'] = 'Direct download url of an order';
7672  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_INVOICE__'] = 'Direct download url of an invoice';
7673  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_CONTRACT__'] = 'Direct download url of a contract';
7674  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_SUPPLIER_PROPOSAL__'] = 'Direct download url of a supplier proposal';
7675 
7676  if (isModEnabled("expedition") && (!is_object($object) || $object->element == 'shipping')) {
7677  $substitutionarray['__SHIPPINGTRACKNUM__'] = 'Shipping tracking number';
7678  $substitutionarray['__SHIPPINGTRACKNUMURL__'] = 'Shipping tracking url';
7679  }
7680  if (isModEnabled("reception") && (!is_object($object) || $object->element == 'reception')) {
7681  $substitutionarray['__RECEPTIONTRACKNUM__'] = 'Shippin tracking number of shipment';
7682  $substitutionarray['__RECEPTIONTRACKNUMURL__'] = 'Shipping tracking url';
7683  }
7684  } else {
7685  $substitutionarray['__ID__'] = $object->id;
7686  $substitutionarray['__REF__'] = $object->ref;
7687  $substitutionarray['__NEWREF__'] = $object->newref;
7688  $substitutionarray['__LABEL__'] = (isset($object->label) ? $object->label : (isset($object->title) ? $object->title : null));
7689  $substitutionarray['__REF_CLIENT__'] = (isset($object->ref_client) ? $object->ref_client : (isset($object->ref_customer) ? $object->ref_customer : null));
7690  $substitutionarray['__REF_SUPPLIER__'] = (isset($object->ref_supplier) ? $object->ref_supplier : null);
7691  $substitutionarray['__NOTE_PUBLIC__'] = (isset($object->note_public) ? $object->note_public : null);
7692  $substitutionarray['__NOTE_PRIVATE__'] = (isset($object->note_private) ? $object->note_private : null);
7693  if ($object->element == "shipping") {
7694  $substitutionarray['__DATE_DELIVERY__'] = (isset($object->date_delivery) ? dol_print_date($object->date_delivery, 'day', 0, $outputlangs) : '');
7695  } else {
7696  $substitutionarray['__DATE_DELIVERY__'] = (isset($object->date_livraison) ? dol_print_date($object->date_livraison, 'day', 0, $outputlangs) : '');
7697  }
7698  $substitutionarray['__DATE_DELIVERY_DAY__'] = (isset($object->date_livraison) ? dol_print_date($object->date_livraison, "%d") : '');
7699  $substitutionarray['__DATE_DELIVERY_DAY_TEXT__'] = (isset($object->date_livraison) ? dol_print_date($object->date_livraison, "%A") : '');
7700  $substitutionarray['__DATE_DELIVERY_MON__'] = (isset($object->date_livraison) ? dol_print_date($object->date_livraison, "%m") : '');
7701  $substitutionarray['__DATE_DELIVERY_MON_TEXT__'] = (isset($object->date_livraison) ? dol_print_date($object->date_livraison, "%b") : '');
7702  $substitutionarray['__DATE_DELIVERY_YEAR__'] = (isset($object->date_livraison) ? dol_print_date($object->date_livraison, "%Y") : '');
7703  $substitutionarray['__DATE_DELIVERY_HH__'] = (isset($object->date_livraison) ? dol_print_date($object->date_livraison, "%H") : '');
7704  $substitutionarray['__DATE_DELIVERY_MM__'] = (isset($object->date_livraison) ? dol_print_date($object->date_livraison, "%M") : '');
7705  $substitutionarray['__DATE_DELIVERY_SS__'] = (isset($object->date_livraison) ? dol_print_date($object->date_livraison, "%S") : '');
7706 
7707  // For backward compatibility
7708  $substitutionarray['__REFCLIENT__'] = (isset($object->ref_client) ? $object->ref_client : (isset($object->ref_customer) ? $object->ref_customer : null));
7709  $substitutionarray['__REFSUPPLIER__'] = (isset($object->ref_supplier) ? $object->ref_supplier : null);
7710  $substitutionarray['__SUPPLIER_ORDER_DATE_DELIVERY__'] = (isset($object->date_livraison) ? dol_print_date($object->date_livraison, 'day', 0, $outputlangs) : '');
7711  $substitutionarray['__SUPPLIER_ORDER_DELAY_DELIVERY__'] = (isset($object->availability_code) ? ($outputlangs->transnoentities("AvailabilityType".$object->availability_code) != ('AvailabilityType'.$object->availability_code) ? $outputlangs->transnoentities("AvailabilityType".$object->availability_code) : $outputlangs->convToOutputCharset(isset($object->availability) ? $object->availability : '')) : '');
7712 
7713  if (is_object($object) && ($object->element == 'adherent' || $object->element == 'member') && $object->id > 0) {
7714  $birthday = (empty($object->birth) ? '' : dol_print_date($object->birth, 'day'));
7715 
7716  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_ID__'] = (isset($object->id) ? $object->id : '');
7717  if (method_exists($object, 'getCivilityLabel')) {
7718  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_CIVILITY__'] = $object->getCivilityLabel();
7719  }
7720  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FIRSTNAME__'] = (isset($object->firstname) ? $object->firstname : '');
7721  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LASTNAME__'] = (isset($object->lastname) ? $object->lastname : '');
7722  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_USER_LOGIN_INFORMATION__'] = '';
7723  if (method_exists($object, 'getFullName')) {
7724  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FULLNAME__'] = $object->getFullName($outputlangs);
7725  }
7726  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_COMPANY__'] = (isset($object->societe) ? $object->societe : '');
7727  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_ADDRESS__'] = (isset($object->address) ? $object->address : '');
7728  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_ZIP__'] = (isset($object->zip) ? $object->zip : '');
7729  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_TOWN__'] = (isset($object->town) ? $object->town : '');
7730  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_COUNTRY__'] = (isset($object->country) ? $object->country : '');
7731  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_EMAIL__'] = (isset($object->email) ? $object->email : '');
7732  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_BIRTH__'] = (isset($birthday) ? $birthday : '');
7733  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_PHOTO__'] = (isset($object->photo) ? $object->photo : '');
7734  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LOGIN__'] = (isset($object->login) ? $object->login : '');
7735  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_PASSWORD__'] = (isset($object->pass) ? $object->pass : '');
7736  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_PHONE__'] = (isset($object->phone) ? dol_print_phone($object->phone) : '');
7737  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_PHONEPRO__'] = (isset($object->phone_perso) ? dol_print_phone($object->phone_perso) : '');
7738  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_PHONEMOBILE__'] = (isset($object->phone_mobile) ? dol_print_phone($object->phone_mobile) : '');
7739  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_TYPE__'] = (isset($object->type) ? $object->type : '');
7740  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FIRST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE__'] = dol_print_date($object->first_subscription_date, 'dayrfc');
7741  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FIRST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE_START__'] = (isset($object->first_subscription_date_start) ? dol_print_date($object->first_subscription_date_start, 'dayrfc') : '');
7742  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_FIRST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE_END__'] = (isset($object->first_subscription_date_end) ? dol_print_date($object->first_subscription_date_end, 'dayrfc') : '');
7743  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LAST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE__'] = dol_print_date($object->last_subscription_date, 'dayrfc');
7744  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LAST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE_START__'] = dol_print_date($object->last_subscription_date_start, 'dayrfc');
7745  $substitutionarray['__MEMBER_LAST_SUBSCRIPTION_DATE_END__'] = dol_print_date($object->last_subscription_date_end, 'dayrfc');
7746  }
7747 
7748  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'societe') {
7749  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ID__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->id : '');
7750  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->name : '');
7751  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME_ALIAS__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->name_alias : '');
7752  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_CODE_CLIENT__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->code_client : '');
7753  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_CODE_FOURNISSEUR__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->code_fournisseur : '');
7754  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_EMAIL__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->email : '');
7755  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_PHONE__'] = (is_object($object) ? dol_print_phone($object->phone) : '');
7756  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_FAX__'] = (is_object($object) ? dol_print_phone($object->fax) : '');
7757  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ADDRESS__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->address : '');
7758  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ZIP__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->zip : '');
7759  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_TOWN__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->town : '');
7760  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_COUNTRY_ID__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->country_id : '');
7761  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_COUNTRY_CODE__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->country_code : '');
7762  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF1__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->idprof1 : '');
7763  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF2__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->idprof2 : '');
7764  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF3__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->idprof3 : '');
7765  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF4__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->idprof4 : '');
7766  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF5__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->idprof5 : '');
7767  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF6__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->idprof6 : '');
7768  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_TVAINTRA__'] = (is_object($object) ? $object->tva_intra : '');
7769  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PUBLIC__'] = (is_object($object) ? dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->note_public) : '');
7770  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PRIVATE__'] = (is_object($object) ? dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->note_private) : '');
7771  } elseif (is_object($object->thirdparty)) {
7772  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ID__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->id : '');
7773  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->name : '');
7774  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NAME_ALIAS__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->name_alias : '');
7775  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_CODE_CLIENT__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->code_client : '');
7776  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_CODE_FOURNISSEUR__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->code_fournisseur : '');
7777  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_EMAIL__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->email : '');
7778  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_PHONE__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? dol_print_phone($object->thirdparty->phone) : '');
7779  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_FAX__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? dol_print_phone($object->thirdparty->fax) : '');
7780  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ADDRESS__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->address : '');
7781  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_ZIP__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->zip : '');
7782  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_TOWN__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->town : '');
7783  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_COUNTRY_ID__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->country_id : '');
7784  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_COUNTRY_CODE__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->country_code : '');
7785  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF1__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->idprof1 : '');
7786  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF2__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->idprof2 : '');
7787  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF3__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->idprof3 : '');
7788  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF4__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->idprof4 : '');
7789  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF5__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->idprof5 : '');
7790  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_IDPROF6__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->idprof6 : '');
7791  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_TVAINTRA__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? $object->thirdparty->tva_intra : '');
7792  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PUBLIC__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->thirdparty->note_public) : '');
7793  $substitutionarray['__THIRDPARTY_NOTE_PRIVATE__'] = (is_object($object->thirdparty) ? dol_htmlentitiesbr($object->thirdparty->note_private) : '');
7794  }
7795 
7796  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'recruitmentcandidature') {
7797  $substitutionarray['__CANDIDATE_FULLNAME__'] = $object->getFullName($outputlangs);
7798  $substitutionarray['__CANDIDATE_FIRSTNAME__'] = isset($object->firstname) ? $object->firstname : '';
7799  $substitutionarray['__CANDIDATE_LASTNAME__'] = isset($object->lastname) ? $object->lastname : '';
7800  }
7801 
7802  if (is_object($object->project)) {
7803  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_ID__'] = (is_object($object->project) ? $object->project->id : '');
7804  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_REF__'] = (is_object($object->project) ? $object->project->ref : '');
7805  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_NAME__'] = (is_object($object->project) ? $object->project->title : '');
7806  }
7807  if (is_object($object->projet)) { // Deprecated, for backward compatibility
7808  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_ID__'] = (is_object($object->projet) ? $object->projet->id : '');
7809  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_REF__'] = (is_object($object->projet) ? $object->projet->ref : '');
7810  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_NAME__'] = (is_object($object->projet) ? $object->projet->title : '');
7811  }
7812  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'project') {
7813  $substitutionarray['__PROJECT_NAME__'] = $object->title;
7814  }
7815 
7816  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'shipping') {
7817  $substitutionarray['__SHIPPINGTRACKNUM__'] = $object->tracking_number;
7818  $substitutionarray['__SHIPPINGTRACKNUMURL__'] = $object->tracking_url;
7819  }
7820  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'reception') {
7821  $substitutionarray['__RECEPTIONTRACKNUM__'] = $object->tracking_number;
7822  $substitutionarray['__RECEPTIONTRACKNUMURL__'] = $object->tracking_url;
7823  }
7824 
7825  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'contrat' && $object->id > 0 && is_array($object->lines)) {
7826  $dateplannedstart = '';
7827  $datenextexpiration = '';
7828  foreach ($object->lines as $line) {
7829  if ($line->date_start > $dateplannedstart) {
7830  $dateplannedstart = $line->date_start;
7831  }
7832  if ($line->statut == 4 && $line->date_end && (!$datenextexpiration || $line->date_end < $datenextexpiration)) {
7833  $datenextexpiration = $line->date_end;
7834  }
7835  }
7836  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_HIGHEST_PLANNED_START_DATE__'] = dol_print_date($dateplannedstart, 'dayrfc');
7837  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_HIGHEST_PLANNED_START_DATETIME__'] = dol_print_date($dateplannedstart, 'standard');
7838  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_LOWEST_EXPIRATION_DATE__'] = dol_print_date($datenextexpiration, 'dayrfc');
7839  $substitutionarray['__CONTRACT_LOWEST_EXPIRATION_DATETIME__'] = dol_print_date($datenextexpiration, 'standard');
7840  }
7841  // add substition variable for ticket
7842  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'ticket') {
7843  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_TRACKID__'] = $object->track_id;
7844  $substitutionarray['__REF__'] = $object->ref;
7845  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_SUBJECT__'] = $object->subject;
7846  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_TYPE__'] = $object->type_code;
7847  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_SEVERITY__'] = $object->severity_code;
7848  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_CATEGORY__'] = $object->category_code; // For backward compatibility
7849  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_ANALYTIC_CODE__'] = $object->category_code;
7850  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_MESSAGE__'] = $object->message;
7851  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_PROGRESSION__'] = $object->progress;
7852  $userstat = new User($db);
7853  if ($object->fk_user_assign > 0) {
7854  $userstat->fetch($object->fk_user_assign);
7855  $substitutionarray['__TICKET_USER_ASSIGN__'] = dolGetFirstLastname($userstat->firstname, $userstat->lastname);
7856  }
7857 
7858  if ($object->fk_user_create > 0) {
7859  $userstat->fetch($object->fk_user_create);
7860  $substitutionarray['__USER_CREATE__'] = dolGetFirstLastname($userstat->firstname, $userstat->lastname);
7861  }
7862  }
7863 
7864  // Create dynamic tags for __EXTRAFIELD_FIELD__
7865  if ($object->table_element && $object->id > 0) {
7866  if (!is_object($extrafields)) {
7867  $extrafields = new ExtraFields($db);
7868  }
7869  $extrafields->fetch_name_optionals_label($object->table_element, true);
7870 
7871  if ($object->fetch_optionals() > 0) {
7872  if (is_array($extrafields->attributes[$object->table_element]['label']) && count($extrafields->attributes[$object->table_element]['label']) > 0) {
7873  foreach ($extrafields->attributes[$object->table_element]['label'] as $key => $label) {
7874  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_'.strtoupper($key).'__'] = $object->array_options['options_'.$key];
7875  if ($extrafields->attributes[$object->table_element]['type'][$key] == 'date') {
7876  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_'.strtoupper($key).'__'] = dol_print_date($object->array_options['options_'.$key], 'day');
7877  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_'.strtoupper($key).'_LOCALE__'] = dol_print_date($object->array_options['options_'.$key], 'day', 'tzserver', $outputlangs);
7878  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_'.strtoupper($key).'_RFC__'] = dol_print_date($object->array_options['options_'.$key], 'dayrfc');
7879  } elseif ($extrafields->attributes[$object->table_element]['type'][$key] == 'datetime') {
7880  $datetime = $object->array_options['options_'.$key];
7881  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_'.strtoupper($key).'__'] = ($datetime != "0000-00-00 00:00:00" ? dol_print_date($datetime, 'dayhour') : '');
7882  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_'.strtoupper($key).'_LOCALE__'] = ($datetime != "0000-00-00 00:00:00" ? dol_print_date($datetime, 'dayhour', 'tzserver', $outputlangs) : '');
7883  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_'.strtoupper($key).'_DAY_LOCALE__'] = ($datetime != "0000-00-00 00:00:00" ? dol_print_date($datetime, 'day', 'tzserver', $outputlangs) : '');
7884  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_'.strtoupper($key).'_RFC__'] = ($datetime != "0000-00-00 00:00:00" ? dol_print_date($datetime, 'dayhourrfc') : '');
7885  } elseif ($extrafields->attributes[$object->table_element]['type'][$key] == 'phone') {
7886  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_'.strtoupper($key).'__'] = dol_print_phone($object->array_options['options_'.$key]);
7887  } elseif ($extrafields->attributes[$object->table_element]['type'][$key] == 'price') {
7888  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_'.strtoupper($key).'__'] = $object->array_options['options_'.$key];
7889  $substitutionarray['__EXTRAFIELD_'.strtoupper($key).'_FORMATED__'] = price($object->array_options['options_'.$key]);
7890  }
7891  }
7892  }
7893  }
7894  }
7895 
7896  // Complete substitution array with the url to make online payment
7897  $paymenturl = '';
7898  if (empty($substitutionarray['__REF__'])) {
7899  $paymenturl = '';
7900  } else {
7901  // Set the online payment url link into __ONLINE_PAYMENT_URL__ key
7902  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/payments.lib.php';
7903  $outputlangs->loadLangs(array('paypal', 'other'));
7904  $typeforonlinepayment = 'free';
7905  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'commande') {
7906  $typeforonlinepayment = 'order';
7907  }
7908  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'facture') {
7909  $typeforonlinepayment = 'invoice';
7910  }
7911  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'member') {
7912  $typeforonlinepayment = 'member';
7913  }
7914  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'contrat') {
7915  $typeforonlinepayment = 'contract';
7916  }
7917  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'fichinter') {
7918  $typeforonlinepayment = 'ficheinter';
7919  }
7920  $url = getOnlinePaymentUrl(0, $typeforonlinepayment, $substitutionarray['__REF__']);
7921  $paymenturl = $url;
7922  }
7923 
7924  if ($object->id > 0) {
7925  $substitutionarray['__ONLINE_PAYMENT_TEXT_AND_URL__'] = ($paymenturl ?str_replace('\n', "\n", $outputlangs->trans("PredefinedMailContentLink", $paymenturl)) : '');
7926  $substitutionarray['__ONLINE_PAYMENT_URL__'] = $paymenturl;
7927 
7928  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'propal') {
7929  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/signature.lib.php';
7930  $substitutionarray['__ONLINE_SIGN_URL__'] = getOnlineSignatureUrl(0, 'proposal', $object->ref);
7931  }
7932  if (!empty($conf->global->PROPOSAL_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD) && is_object($object) && $object->element == 'propal') {
7933  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_PROPOSAL__'] = $object->getLastMainDocLink($object->element);
7934  } else {
7935  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_PROPOSAL__'] = '';
7936  }
7937  if (!empty($conf->global->ORDER_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD) && is_object($object) && $object->element == 'commande') {
7938  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_ORDER__'] = $object->getLastMainDocLink($object->element);
7939  } else {
7940  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_ORDER__'] = '';
7941  }
7942  if (!empty($conf->global->INVOICE_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD) && is_object($object) && $object->element == 'facture') {
7943  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_INVOICE__'] = $object->getLastMainDocLink($object->element);
7944  } else {
7945  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_INVOICE__'] = '';
7946  }
7947  if (!empty($conf->global->CONTRACT_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD) && is_object($object) && $object->element == 'contrat') {
7948  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_CONTRACT__'] = $object->getLastMainDocLink($object->element);
7949  } else {
7950  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_CONTRACT__'] = '';
7951  }
7952  if (!empty($conf->global->FICHINTER_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD) && is_object($object) && $object->element == 'fichinter') {
7953  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_FICHINTER__'] = $object->getLastMainDocLink($object->element);
7954  } else {
7955  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_FICHINTER__'] = '';
7956  }
7957  if (!empty($conf->global->SUPPLIER_PROPOSAL_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD) && is_object($object) && $object->element == 'supplier_proposal') {
7958  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_SUPPLIER_PROPOSAL__'] = $object->getLastMainDocLink($object->element);
7959  } else {
7960  $substitutionarray['__DIRECTDOWNLOAD_URL_SUPPLIER_PROPOSAL__'] = '';
7961  }
7962 
7963  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'propal') {
7964  $substitutionarray['__URL_PROPOSAL__'] = DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT."/comm/propal/card.php?id=".$object->id;
7965  }
7966  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'commande') {
7967  $substitutionarray['__URL_ORDER__'] = DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT."/commande/card.php?id=".$object->id;
7968  }
7969  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'facture') {
7970  $substitutionarray['__URL_INVOICE__'] = DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT."/compta/facture/card.php?id=".$object->id;
7971  }
7972  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'contrat') {
7973  $substitutionarray['__URL_CONTRACT__'] = DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT."/contrat/card.php?id=".$object->id;
7974  }
7975  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'fichinter') {
7976  $substitutionarray['__URL_FICHINTER__'] = DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT."/fichinter/card.php?id=".$object->id;
7977  }
7978  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'supplier_proposal') {
7979  $substitutionarray['__URL_SUPPLIER_PROPOSAL__'] = DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT."/supplier_proposal/card.php?id=".$object->id;
7980  }
7981  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'shipping') {
7982  $substitutionarray['__URL_SHIPMENT__'] = DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT."/expedition/card.php?id=".$object->id;
7983  }
7984  }
7985 
7986  if (is_object($object) && $object->element == 'action') {
7987  $substitutionarray['__EVENT_LABEL__'] = $object->label;
7988  $substitutionarray['__EVENT_DATE__'] = dol_print_date($object->datep, '%A %d %b %Y');
7989  $substitutionarray['__EVENT_TIME__'] = dol_print_date($object->datep, '%H:%M:%S');
7990  }
7991  }
7992  }
7993  if (empty($exclude) || !in_array('objectamount', $exclude)) {
7994  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/functionsnumtoword.lib.php';
7995 
7996  $substitutionarray['__DATE_YMD__'] = is_object($object) ? (isset($object->date) ? dol_print_date($object->date, 'day', 0, $outputlangs) : null) : '';
7997  $substitutionarray['__DATE_DUE_YMD__'] = is_object($object) ? (isset($object->date_lim_reglement) ? dol_print_date($object->date_lim_reglement, 'day', 0, $outputlangs) : null) : '';
7998 
7999  $already_payed_all = 0;
8000  if (is_object($object) && ($object instanceof Facture)) {
8001  $already_payed_all = $object->sumpayed + $object->sumdeposit + $object->sumcreditnote;
8002  }
8003 
8004  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_EXCL_TAX__'] = is_object($object) ? $object->total_ht : '';
8005 
8006  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT__'] = is_object($object) ? $object->total_ttc : '';
8007  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_TEXT__'] = is_object($object) ? dol_convertToWord($object->total_ttc, $outputlangs, '', true) : '';
8008  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_TEXTCURRENCY__'] = is_object($object) ? dol_convertToWord($object->total_ttc, $outputlangs, $conf->currency, true) : '';
8009 
8010  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_REMAIN__'] = is_object($object) ? $object->total_ttc - $already_payed_all : '';
8011 
8012  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_VAT__'] = is_object($object) ? (isset($object->total_vat) ? $object->total_vat : $object->total_tva) : '';
8013  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_VAT_TEXT__'] = is_object($object) ? (isset($object->total_vat) ? dol_convertToWord($object->total_vat, $outputlangs, '', true) : dol_convertToWord($object->total_tva, $outputlangs, '', true)) : '';
8014  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_VAT_TEXTCURRENCY__'] = is_object($object) ? (isset($object->total_vat) ? dol_convertToWord($object->total_vat, $outputlangs, $conf->currency, true) : dol_convertToWord($object->total_tva, $outputlangs, $conf->currency, true)) : '';
8015 
8016  if ($onlykey != 2 || $mysoc->useLocalTax(1)) {
8017  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_TAX2__'] = is_object($object) ? $object->total_localtax1 : '';
8018  }
8019  if ($onlykey != 2 || $mysoc->useLocalTax(2)) {
8020  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_TAX3__'] = is_object($object) ? $object->total_localtax2 : '';
8021  }
8022 
8023  // Amount keys formated in a currency
8024  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_EXCL_TAX_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object) ? ($object->total_ht ? price($object->total_ht, 0, $outputlangs, 0, -1, -1, $conf->currency) : null) : '';
8025  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object) ? ($object->total_ttc ? price($object->total_ttc, 0, $outputlangs, 0, -1, -1, $conf->currency) : null) : '';
8026  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_REMAIN_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object) ? ($object->total_ttc ? price($object->total_ttc - $already_payed_all, 0, $outputlangs, 0, -1, -1, $conf->currency) : null) : '';
8027  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_VAT_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object) ? (isset($object->total_vat) ? price($object->total_vat, 0, $outputlangs, 0, -1, -1, $conf->currency) : ($object->total_tva ? price($object->total_tva, 0, $outputlangs, 0, -1, -1, $conf->currency) : null)) : '';
8028  if ($onlykey != 2 || $mysoc->useLocalTax(1)) {
8029  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_TAX2_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object) ? ($object->total_localtax1 ? price($object->total_localtax1, 0, $outputlangs, 0, -1, -1, $conf->currency) : null) : '';
8030  }
8031  if ($onlykey != 2 || $mysoc->useLocalTax(2)) {
8032  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_TAX3_FORMATED__'] = is_object($object) ? ($object->total_localtax2 ? price($object->total_localtax2, 0, $outputlangs, 0, -1, -1, $conf->currency) : null) : '';
8033  }
8034 
8035  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_MULTICURRENCY__'] = (is_object($object) && isset($object->multicurrency_total_ttc)) ? $object->multicurrency_total_ttc : '';
8036  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_MULTICURRENCY_TEXT__'] = (is_object($object) && isset($object->multicurrency_total_ttc)) ? dol_convertToWord($object->multicurrency_total_ttc, $outputlangs, '', true) : '';
8037  $substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_MULTICURRENCY_TEXTCURRENCY__'] = (is_object($object) && isset($object->multicurrency_total_ttc)) ? dol_convertToWord($object->multicurrency_total_ttc, $outputlangs, $object->multicurrency_code, true) : '';
8038  // TODO Add other keys for foreign multicurrency
8039 
8040  // For backward compatibility
8041  if ($onlykey != 2) {
8042  $substitutionarray['__TOTAL_TTC__'] = is_object($object) ? $object->total_ttc : '';
8043  $substitutionarray['__TOTAL_HT__'] = is_object($object) ? $object->total_ht : '';
8044  $substitutionarray['__TOTAL_VAT__'] = is_object($object) ? (isset($object->total_vat) ? $object->total_vat : $object->total_tva) : '';
8045  }
8046  }
8047 
8048  //var_dump($substitutionarray['__AMOUNT_FORMATED__']);
8049  if (empty($exclude) || !in_array('date', $exclude)) {
8050  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/date.lib.php';
8051 
8052  $now = dol_now();
8053 
8054  $tmp = dol_getdate($now, true);
8055  $tmp2 = dol_get_prev_day($tmp['mday'], $tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']);
8056  $tmp3 = dol_get_prev_month($tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']);
8057  $tmp4 = dol_get_next_day($tmp['mday'], $tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']);
8058  $tmp5 = dol_get_next_month($tmp['mon'], $tmp['year']);
8059 
8060  $daytext = $outputlangs->trans('Day'.$tmp['wday']);
8061 
8062  $substitutionarray = array_merge($substitutionarray, array(
8063  '__NOW_TMS__' => (int) $now,
8064  '__NOW_TMS_YMD__' => dol_print_date($now, 'day', 0, $outputlangs),
8065  '__DAY__' => (string) $tmp['mday'],
8066  '__DAY_TEXT__' => $daytext, // Monday
8067  '__DAY_TEXT_SHORT__' => dol_trunc($daytext, 3, 'right', 'UTF-8', 1), // Mon
8068  '__DAY_TEXT_MIN__' => dol_trunc($daytext, 1, 'right', 'UTF-8', 1), // M
8069  '__MONTH__' => (string) $tmp['mon'],
8070  '__MONTH_TEXT__' => $outputlangs->trans('Month'.sprintf("%02d", $tmp['mon'])),
8071  '__MONTH_TEXT_SHORT__' => $outputlangs->trans('MonthShort'.sprintf("%02d", $tmp['mon'])),
8072  '__MONTH_TEXT_MIN__' => $outputlangs->trans('MonthVeryShort'.sprintf("%02d", $tmp['mon'])),
8073  '__YEAR__' => (string) $tmp['year'],
8074  '__PREVIOUS_DAY__' => (string) $tmp2['day'],
8075  '__PREVIOUS_MONTH__' => (string) $tmp3['month'],
8076  '__PREVIOUS_YEAR__' => (string) ($tmp['year'] - 1),
8077  '__NEXT_DAY__' => (string) $tmp4['day'],
8078  '__NEXT_MONTH__' => (string) $tmp5['month'],
8079  '__NEXT_YEAR__' => (string) ($tmp['year'] + 1),
8080  ));
8081  }
8082 
8083  if (isModEnabled('multicompany')) {
8084  $substitutionarray = array_merge($substitutionarray, array('__ENTITY_ID__' => $conf->entity));
8085  }
8086  if (empty($exclude) || !in_array('system', $exclude)) {
8087  $substitutionarray['__DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT__'] = DOL_MAIN_URL_ROOT;
8088  $substitutionarray['__(AnyTranslationKey)__'] = $outputlangs->trans('TranslationOfKey');
8089  $substitutionarray['__(AnyTranslationKey|langfile)__'] = $outputlangs->trans('TranslationOfKey').' (load also language file before)';
8090  $substitutionarray['__[AnyConstantKey]__'] = $outputlangs->trans('ValueOfConstantKey');
8091  }
8092 
8093  return $substitutionarray;
8094 }
8095 
8112 function make_substitutions($text, $substitutionarray, $outputlangs = null, $converttextinhtmlifnecessary = 0)
8113 {
8114  global $conf, $langs;
8115 
8116  if (!is_array($substitutionarray)) {
8117  return 'ErrorBadParameterSubstitutionArrayWhenCalling_make_substitutions';
8118  }
8119 
8120  if (empty($outputlangs)) {
8121  $outputlangs = $langs;
8122  }
8123 
8124  // Is initial text HTML or simple text ?
8125  $msgishtml = 0;
8126  if (dol_textishtml($text, 1)) {
8127  $msgishtml = 1;
8128  }
8129 
8130  // Make substitution for language keys: __(AnyTranslationKey)__ or __(AnyTranslationKey|langfile)__
8131  if (is_object($outputlangs)) {
8132  $reg = array();
8133  while (preg_match('/__\‍(([^\‍)]+)\‍)__/', $text, $reg)) {
8134  // If key is __(TranslationKey|langfile)__, then force load of langfile.lang
8135  $tmp = explode('|', $reg[1]);
8136  if (!empty($tmp[1])) {
8137  $outputlangs->load($tmp[1]);
8138  }
8139 
8140  $value = $outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv($reg[1]);
8141 
8142  if (empty($converttextinhtmlifnecessary)) {
8143  // convert $newval into HTML is necessary
8144  $text = preg_replace('/__\‍('.preg_quote($reg[1], '/').'\‍)__/', $msgishtml ? dol_htmlentitiesbr($value) : $value, $text);
8145  } else {
8146  if (! $msgishtml) {
8147  $valueishtml = dol_textishtml($value, 1);
8148  //var_dump("valueishtml=".$valueishtml);
8149 
8150  if ($valueishtml) {
8151  $text = dol_htmlentitiesbr($text);
8152  $msgishtml = 1;
8153  }
8154  } else {
8155  $value = dol_nl2br("$value");
8156  }
8157 
8158  $text = preg_replace('/__\‍('.preg_quote($reg[1], '/').'\‍)__/', $value, $text);
8159  }
8160  }
8161  }
8162 
8163  // Make substitution for constant keys.
8164  // Must be after the substitution of translation, so if the text of translation contains a string __[xxx]__, it is also converted.
8165  $reg = array();
8166  while (preg_match('/__\[([^\]]+)\]__/', $text, $reg)) {
8167  $keyfound = $reg[1];
8168  if (isASecretKey($keyfound)) {
8169  $value = '*****forbidden*****';
8170  } else {
8171  $value = empty($conf->global->$keyfound) ? '' : $conf->global->$keyfound;
8172  }
8173 
8174  if (empty($converttextinhtmlifnecessary)) {
8175  // convert $newval into HTML is necessary
8176  $text = preg_replace('/__\['.preg_quote($keyfound, '/').'\]__/', $msgishtml ? dol_htmlentitiesbr($value) : $value, $text);
8177  } else {
8178  if (! $msgishtml) {
8179  $valueishtml = dol_textishtml($value, 1);
8180 
8181  if ($valueishtml) {
8182  $text = dol_htmlentitiesbr($text);
8183  $msgishtml = 1;
8184  }
8185  } else {
8186  $value = dol_nl2br("$value");
8187  }
8188 
8189  $text = preg_replace('/__\['.preg_quote($keyfound, '/').'\]__/', $value, $text);
8190  }
8191  }
8192 
8193  // Make substitution for array $substitutionarray
8194  foreach ($substitutionarray as $key => $value) {
8195  if (!isset($value)) {
8196  continue; // If value is null, it same than not having substitution key at all into array, we do not replace.
8197  }
8198 
8199  if (($key == '__USER_SIGNATURE__' || $key == '__SENDEREMAIL_SIGNATURE__') && (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_MAIL_DO_NOT_USE_SIGN))) {
8200  $value = ''; // Protection
8201  }
8202 
8203  if (empty($converttextinhtmlifnecessary)) {
8204  $text = str_replace("$key", "$value", $text); // We must keep the " to work when value is 123.5 for example
8205  } else {
8206  if (! $msgishtml) {
8207  $valueishtml = dol_textishtml($value, 1);
8208 
8209  if ($valueishtml) {
8210  $text = dol_htmlentitiesbr($text);
8211  $msgishtml = 1;
8212  }
8213  } else {
8214  $value = dol_nl2br("$value");
8215  }
8216  $text = str_replace("$key", "$value", $text); // We must keep the " to work when value is 123.5 for example
8217  }
8218  }
8219 
8220  return $text;
8221 }
8222 
8235 function complete_substitutions_array(&$substitutionarray, $outputlangs, $object = null, $parameters = null, $callfunc = "completesubstitutionarray")
8236 {
8237  global $conf, $user;
8238 
8239  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/files.lib.php';
8240 
8241  // Note: substitution key for each extrafields, using key __EXTRA_XXX__ is already available into the getCommonSubstitutionArray used to build the substitution array.
8242 
8243  // Check if there is external substitution to do, requested by plugins
8244  $dirsubstitutions = array_merge(array(), (array) $conf->modules_parts['substitutions']);
8245 
8246  foreach ($dirsubstitutions as $reldir) {
8247  $dir = dol_buildpath($reldir, 0);
8248 
8249  // Check if directory exists
8250  if (!dol_is_dir($dir)) {
8251  continue;
8252  }
8253 
8254  $substitfiles = dol_dir_list($dir, 'files', 0, 'functions_');
8255  foreach ($substitfiles as $substitfile) {
8256  $reg = array();
8257  if (preg_match('/functions_(.*)\.lib\.php/i', $substitfile['name'], $reg)) {
8258  $module = $reg[1];
8259 
8260  dol_syslog("Library ".$substitfile['name']." found into ".$dir);
8261  // Include the user's functions file
8262  require_once $dir.$substitfile['name'];
8263  // Call the user's function, and only if it is defined
8264  $function_name = $module."_".$callfunc;
8265  if (function_exists($function_name)) {
8266  $function_name($substitutionarray, $outputlangs, $object, $parameters);
8267  }
8268  }
8269  }
8270  }
8271  if (!empty($conf->global->ODT_ENABLE_ALL_TAGS_IN_SUBSTITUTIONS)) {
8272  // to list all tags in odt template
8273  $tags = '';
8274  foreach ($substitutionarray as $key => $value) {
8275  $tags .= '{'.$key.'} => '.$value."\n";
8276  }
8277  $substitutionarray = array_merge($substitutionarray, array('__ALL_TAGS__' => $tags));
8278  }
8279 }
8280 
8290 function print_date_range($date_start, $date_end, $format = '', $outputlangs = '')
8291 {
8292  print get_date_range($date_start, $date_end, $format, $outputlangs);
8293 }
8294 
8305 function get_date_range($date_start, $date_end, $format = '', $outputlangs = '', $withparenthesis = 1)
8306 {
8307  global $langs;
8308 
8309  $out = '';
8310 
8311  if (!is_object($outputlangs)) {
8312  $outputlangs = $langs;
8313  }
8314 
8315  if ($date_start && $date_end) {
8316  $out .= ($withparenthesis ? ' (' : '').$outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv('DateFromTo', dol_print_date($date_start, $format, false, $outputlangs), dol_print_date($date_end, $format, false, $outputlangs)).($withparenthesis ? ')' : '');
8317  }
8318  if ($date_start && !$date_end) {
8319  $out .= ($withparenthesis ? ' (' : '').$outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv('DateFrom', dol_print_date($date_start, $format, false, $outputlangs)).($withparenthesis ? ')' : '');
8320  }
8321  if (!$date_start && $date_end) {
8322  $out .= ($withparenthesis ? ' (' : '').$outputlangs->transnoentitiesnoconv('DateUntil', dol_print_date($date_end, $format, false, $outputlangs)).($withparenthesis ? ')' : '');
8323  }
8324 
8325  return $out;
8326 }
8327 
8336 function dolGetFirstLastname($firstname, $lastname, $nameorder = -1)
8337 {
8338  global $conf;
8339 
8340  $ret = '';
8341  // If order not defined, we use the setup
8342  if ($nameorder < 0) {
8343  $nameorder = (empty($conf->global->MAIN_FIRSTNAME_NAME_POSITION) ? 1 : 0);
8344  }
8345  if ($nameorder == 1) {
8346  $ret .= $firstname;
8347  if ($firstname && $lastname) {
8348  $ret .= ' ';
8349  }
8350  $ret .= $lastname;
8351  } elseif ($nameorder == 2 || $nameorder == 3) {
8352  $ret .= $firstname;
8353  if (empty($ret) && $nameorder == 3) {
8354  $ret .= $lastname;
8355  }
8356  } else { // 0, 4 or 5
8357  $ret .= $lastname;
8358  if (empty($ret) && $nameorder == 5) {
8359  $ret .= $firstname;
8360  }
8361  if ($nameorder == 0) {
8362  if ($firstname && $lastname) {
8363  $ret .= ' ';
8364  }
8365  $ret .= $firstname;
8366  }
8367  }
8368  return $ret;
8369 }
8370 
8371 
8382 function setEventMessage($mesgs, $style = 'mesgs')
8383 {
8384  //dol_syslog(__FUNCTION__ . " is deprecated", LOG_WARNING); This is not deprecated, it is used by setEventMessages function
8385  if (!is_array($mesgs)) {
8386  // If mesgs is a string
8387  if ($mesgs) {
8388  $_SESSION['dol_events'][$style][] = $mesgs;
8389  }
8390  } else {
8391  // If mesgs is an array
8392  foreach ($mesgs as $mesg) {
8393  if ($mesg) {
8394  $_SESSION['dol_events'][$style][] = $mesg;
8395  }
8396  }
8397  }
8398 }
8399 
8411 function setEventMessages($mesg, $mesgs, $style = 'mesgs', $messagekey = '')
8412 {
8413  if (empty($mesg) && empty($mesgs)) {
8414  dol_syslog("Try to add a message in stack with empty message", LOG_WARNING);
8415  } else {
8416  if ($messagekey) {
8417  // Complete message with a js link to set a cookie "DOLHIDEMESSAGE".$messagekey;
8418  // TODO
8419  $mesg .= '';
8420  }
8421  if (empty($messagekey) || empty($_COOKIE["DOLHIDEMESSAGE".$messagekey])) {
8422  if (!in_array((string) $style, array('mesgs', 'warnings', 'errors'))) {
8423  dol_print_error('', 'Bad parameter style='.$style.' for setEventMessages');
8424  }
8425  if (empty($mesgs)) {
8426  setEventMessage($mesg, $style);
8427  } else {
8428  if (!empty($mesg) && !in_array($mesg, $mesgs)) {
8429  setEventMessage($mesg, $style); // Add message string if not already into array
8430  }
8431  setEventMessage($mesgs, $style);
8432  }
8433  }
8434  }
8435 }
8436 
8446 function dol_htmloutput_events($disabledoutputofmessages = 0)
8447 {
8448  // Show mesgs
8449  if (isset($_SESSION['dol_events']['mesgs'])) {
8450  if (empty($disabledoutputofmessages)) {
8451  dol_htmloutput_mesg('', $_SESSION['dol_events']['mesgs']);
8452  }
8453  unset($_SESSION['dol_events']['mesgs']);
8454  }
8455  // Show errors
8456  if (isset($_SESSION['dol_events']['errors'])) {
8457  if (empty($disabledoutputofmessages)) {
8458  dol_htmloutput_mesg('', $_SESSION['dol_events']['errors'], 'error');
8459  }
8460  unset($_SESSION['dol_events']['errors']);
8461  }
8462 
8463  // Show warnings
8464  if (isset($_SESSION['dol_events']['warnings'])) {
8465  if (empty($disabledoutputofmessages)) {
8466  dol_htmloutput_mesg('', $_SESSION['dol_events']['warnings'], 'warning');
8467  }
8468  unset($_SESSION['dol_events']['warnings']);
8469  }
8470 }
8471 
8486 function get_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring = '', $mesgarray = '', $style = 'ok', $keepembedded = 0)
8487 {
8488  global $conf, $langs;
8489 
8490  $ret = 0;
8491  $return = '';
8492  $out = '';
8493  $divstart = $divend = '';
8494 
8495  // If inline message with no format, we add it.
8496  if ((empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) || !empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_JQUERY_JNOTIFY) || $keepembedded) && !preg_match('/<div class=".*">/i', $out)) {
8497  $divstart = '<div class="'.$style.' clearboth">';
8498  $divend = '</div>';
8499  }
8500 
8501  if ((is_array($mesgarray) && count($mesgarray)) || $mesgstring) {
8502  $langs->load("errors");
8503  $out .= $divstart;
8504  if (is_array($mesgarray) && count($mesgarray)) {
8505  foreach ($mesgarray as $message) {
8506  $ret++;
8507  $out .= $langs->trans($message);
8508  if ($ret < count($mesgarray)) {
8509  $out .= "<br>\n";
8510  }
8511  }
8512  }
8513  if ($mesgstring) {
8514  $ret++;
8515  $out .= $langs->trans($mesgstring);
8516  }
8517  $out .= $divend;
8518  }
8519 
8520  if ($out) {
8521  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_JQUERY_JNOTIFY) && empty($keepembedded)) {
8522  $return = '<script>
8523  $(document).ready(function() {
8524  var block = '.(!empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_JQUERY_BLOCKUI) ? "true" : "false").'
8525  if (block) {
8526  $.dolEventValid("","'.dol_escape_js($out).'");
8527  } else {
8528  /* jnotify(message, preset of message type, keepmessage) */
8529  $.jnotify("'.dol_escape_js($out).'",
8530  "'.($style == "ok" ? 3000 : $style).'",
8531  '.($style == "ok" ? "false" : "true").',
8532  { remove: function (){} } );
8533  }
8534  });
8535  </script>';
8536  } else {
8537  $return = $out;
8538  }
8539  }
8540 
8541  return $return;
8542 }
8543 
8555 function get_htmloutput_errors($mesgstring = '', $mesgarray = array(), $keepembedded = 0)
8556 {
8557  return get_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring, $mesgarray, 'error', $keepembedded);
8558 }
8559 
8573 function dol_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring = '', $mesgarray = array(), $style = 'ok', $keepembedded = 0)
8574 {
8575  if (empty($mesgstring) && (!is_array($mesgarray) || count($mesgarray) == 0)) {
8576  return;
8577  }
8578 
8579  $iserror = 0;
8580  $iswarning = 0;
8581  if (is_array($mesgarray)) {
8582  foreach ($mesgarray as $val) {
8583  if ($val && preg_match('/class="error"/i', $val)) {
8584  $iserror++;
8585  break;
8586  }
8587  if ($val && preg_match('/class="warning"/i', $val)) {
8588  $iswarning++;
8589  break;
8590  }
8591  }
8592  } elseif ($mesgstring && preg_match('/class="error"/i', $mesgstring)) {
8593  $iserror++;
8594  } elseif ($mesgstring && preg_match('/class="warning"/i', $mesgstring)) {
8595  $iswarning++;
8596  }
8597  if ($style == 'error') {
8598  $iserror++;
8599  }
8600  if ($style == 'warning') {
8601  $iswarning++;
8602  }
8603 
8604  if ($iserror || $iswarning) {
8605  // Remove div from texts
8606  $mesgstring = preg_replace('/<\/div><div class="(error|warning)">/', '<br>', $mesgstring);
8607  $mesgstring = preg_replace('/<div class="(error|warning)">/', '', $mesgstring);
8608  $mesgstring = preg_replace('/<\/div>/', '', $mesgstring);
8609  // Remove div from texts array
8610  if (is_array($mesgarray)) {
8611  $newmesgarray = array();
8612  foreach ($mesgarray as $val) {
8613  if (is_string($val)) {
8614  $tmpmesgstring = preg_replace('/<\/div><div class="(error|warning)">/', '<br>', $val);
8615  $tmpmesgstring = preg_replace('/<div class="(error|warning)">/', '', $tmpmesgstring);
8616  $tmpmesgstring = preg_replace('/<\/div>/', '', $tmpmesgstring);
8617  $newmesgarray[] = $tmpmesgstring;
8618  } else {
8619  dol_syslog("Error call of dol_htmloutput_mesg with an array with a value that is not a string", LOG_WARNING);
8620  }
8621  }
8622  $mesgarray = $newmesgarray;
8623  }
8624  print get_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring, $mesgarray, ($iserror ? 'error' : 'warning'), $keepembedded);
8625  } else {
8626  print get_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring, $mesgarray, 'ok', $keepembedded);
8627  }
8628 }
8629 
8641 function dol_htmloutput_errors($mesgstring = '', $mesgarray = array(), $keepembedded = 0)
8642 {
8643  dol_htmloutput_mesg($mesgstring, $mesgarray, 'error', $keepembedded);
8644 }
8645 
8660 function dol_sort_array(&$array, $index, $order = 'asc', $natsort = 0, $case_sensitive = 0, $keepindex = 0)
8661 {
8662  // Clean parameters
8663  $order = strtolower($order);
8664 
8665  if (is_array($array)) {
8666  $sizearray = count($array);
8667  if ($sizearray > 0) {
8668  $temp = array();
8669  foreach (array_keys($array) as $key) {
8670  if (is_object($array[$key])) {
8671  $temp[$key] = empty($array[$key]->$index) ? 0 : $array[$key]->$index;
8672  } else {
8673  $temp[$key] = empty($array[$key][$index]) ? 0 : $array[$key][$index];
8674  }
8675  if ($natsort == -1) {
8676  $temp[$key] = '___'.$temp[$key]; // We add a string at begin of value to force an alpha order when using asort.
8677  }
8678  }
8679 
8680  if (empty($natsort) || $natsort == -1) {
8681  if ($order == 'asc') {
8682  asort($temp);
8683  } else {
8684  arsort($temp);
8685  }
8686  } else {
8687  if ($case_sensitive) {
8688  natsort($temp);
8689  } else {
8690  natcasesort($temp); // natecasesort is not sensible to case
8691  }
8692  if ($order != 'asc') {
8693  $temp = array_reverse($temp, true);
8694  }
8695  }
8696 
8697  $sorted = array();
8698 
8699  foreach (array_keys($temp) as $key) {
8700  (is_numeric($key) && empty($keepindex)) ? $sorted[] = $array[$key] : $sorted[$key] = $array[$key];
8701  }
8702 
8703  return $sorted;
8704  }
8705  }
8706  return $array;
8707 }
8708 
8709 
8716 function utf8_check($str)
8717 {
8718  $str = (string) $str; // Sometimes string is an int.
8719 
8720  // We must use here a binary strlen function (so not dol_strlen)
8721  $strLength = dol_strlen($str);
8722  for ($i = 0; $i < $strLength; $i++) {
8723  if (ord($str[$i]) < 0x80) {
8724  continue; // 0bbbbbbb
8725  } elseif ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xE0) == 0xC0) {
8726  $n = 1; // 110bbbbb
8727  } elseif ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xF0) == 0xE0) {
8728  $n = 2; // 1110bbbb
8729  } elseif ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xF8) == 0xF0) {
8730  $n = 3; // 11110bbb
8731  } elseif ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xFC) == 0xF8) {
8732  $n = 4; // 111110bb
8733  } elseif ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xFE) == 0xFC) {
8734  $n = 5; // 1111110b
8735  } else {
8736  return false; // Does not match any model
8737  }
8738  for ($j = 0; $j < $n; $j++) { // n bytes matching 10bbbbbb follow ?
8739  if ((++$i == strlen($str)) || ((ord($str[$i]) & 0xC0) != 0x80)) {
8740  return false;
8741  }
8742  }
8743  }
8744  return true;
8745 }
8746 
8753 function ascii_check($str)
8754 {
8755  if (function_exists('mb_check_encoding')) {
8756  //if (mb_detect_encoding($str, 'ASCII', true) return false;
8757  if (!mb_check_encoding($str, 'ASCII')) {
8758  return false;
8759  }
8760  } else {
8761  if (preg_match('/[^\x00-\x7f]/', $str)) {
8762  return false; // Contains a byte > 7f
8763  }
8764  }
8765 
8766  return true;
8767 }
8768 
8769 
8777 function dol_osencode($str)
8778 {
8779  global $conf;
8780 
8781  $tmp = ini_get("unicode.filesystem_encoding"); // Disponible avec PHP 6.0
8782  if (empty($tmp) && !empty($_SERVER["WINDIR"])) {
8783  $tmp = 'iso-8859-1'; // By default for windows
8784  }
8785  if (empty($tmp)) {
8786  $tmp = 'utf-8'; // By default for other
8787  }
8788  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_FILESYSTEM_ENCODING)) {
8789  $tmp = $conf->global->MAIN_FILESYSTEM_ENCODING;
8790  }
8791 
8792  if ($tmp == 'iso-8859-1') {
8793  return utf8_decode($str);
8794  }
8795  return $str;
8796 }
8797 
8798 
8813 function dol_getIdFromCode($db, $key, $tablename, $fieldkey = 'code', $fieldid = 'id', $entityfilter = 0, $filters = '')
8814 {
8815  global $cache_codes;
8816 
8817  // If key empty
8818  if ($key == '') {
8819  return '';
8820  }
8821 
8822  // Check in cache
8823  if (isset($cache_codes[$tablename][$key][$fieldid])) { // Can be defined to 0 or ''
8824  return $cache_codes[$tablename][$key][$fieldid]; // Found in cache
8825  }
8826 
8827  dol_syslog('dol_getIdFromCode (value for field '.$fieldid.' from key '.$key.' not found into cache)', LOG_DEBUG);
8828 
8829  $sql = "SELECT ".$fieldid." as valuetoget";
8830  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$tablename;
8831  $sql .= " WHERE ".$fieldkey." = '".$db->escape($key)."'";
8832  if (!empty($entityfilter)) {
8833  $sql .= " AND entity IN (".getEntity($tablename).")";
8834  }
8835  if ($filters) {
8836  $sql .= $filters;
8837  }
8838 
8839  $resql = $db->query($sql);
8840  if ($resql) {
8841  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
8842  if ($obj) {
8843  $cache_codes[$tablename][$key][$fieldid] = $obj->valuetoget;
8844  } else {
8845  $cache_codes[$tablename][$key][$fieldid] = '';
8846  }
8847  $db->free($resql);
8848  return $cache_codes[$tablename][$key][$fieldid];
8849  } else {
8850  return -1;
8851  }
8852 }
8853 
8860 function verifCond($strToEvaluate)
8861 {
8862  global $user, $conf, $langs;
8863  global $leftmenu;
8864  global $rights; // To export to dol_eval function
8865 
8866  //print $strToEvaluate."<br>\n";
8867  $rights = true;
8868  if (isset($strToEvaluate) && $strToEvaluate !== '') {
8869  //var_dump($strToEvaluate);
8870  $rep = dol_eval($strToEvaluate, 1, 1, '1'); // The dol_eval must contains all the global $xxx for all variables $xxx found into the string condition
8871  $rights = $rep && (!is_string($rep) || strpos($rep, 'Bad string syntax to evaluate') === false);
8872  //var_dump($rights);
8873  }
8874  return $rights;
8875 }
8876 
8887 function dol_eval($s, $returnvalue = 0, $hideerrors = 1, $onlysimplestring = '1')
8888 {
8889  // Only global variables can be changed by eval function and returned to caller
8890  global $db, $langs, $user, $conf, $website, $websitepage;
8891  global $action, $mainmenu, $leftmenu;
8892  global $rights;
8893  global $object;
8894  global $mysoc;
8895 
8896  global $obj; // To get $obj used into list when dol_eval is used for computed fields and $obj is not yet $object
8897  global $soc; // For backward compatibility
8898 
8899  // Test on dangerous char (used for RCE), we allow only characters to make PHP variable testing
8900  if ($onlysimplestring == '1') {
8901  // We must accept: '1 && getDolGlobalInt("doesnotexist1") && $conf->global->MAIN_FEATURES_LEVEL'
8902  // We must accept: '$conf->barcode->enabled || preg_match(\'/^AAA/\',$leftmenu)'
8903  // We must accept: '$user->rights->cabinetmed->read && !$object->canvas=="patient@cabinetmed"'
8904  if (preg_match('/[^a-z0-9\s'.preg_quote('^$_+-.*>&|=!?():"\',/@', '/').']/i', $s)) {
8905  if ($returnvalue) {
8906  return 'Bad string syntax to evaluate (found chars that are not chars for simplestring): '.$s;
8907  } else {
8908  dol_syslog('Bad string syntax to evaluate (found chars that are not chars for simplestring): '.$s);
8909  return '';
8910  }
8911  // TODO
8912  // We can exclude all parenthesis ( that are not '($db' and 'getDolGlobalInt(' and 'getDolGlobalString(' and 'preg_match(' and 'isModEnabled('
8913  // ...
8914  }
8915  } elseif ($onlysimplestring == '2') {
8916  // We must accept: (($reloadedobj = new Task($db)) && ($reloadedobj->fetchNoCompute($object->id) > 0) && ($secondloadedobj = new Project($db)) && ($secondloadedobj->fetchNoCompute($reloadedobj->fk_project) > 0)) ? $secondloadedobj->ref : "Parent project not found"
8917  if (preg_match('/[^a-z0-9\s'.preg_quote('^$_+-.*>&|=!?():"\',/@;[]', '/').']/i', $s)) {
8918  if ($returnvalue) {
8919  return 'Bad string syntax to evaluate (found chars that are not chars for simplestring): '.$s;
8920  } else {
8921  dol_syslog('Bad string syntax to evaluate (found chars that are not chars for simplestring): '.$s);
8922  return '';
8923  }
8924  }
8925  }
8926  if (strpos($s, '::') !== false) {
8927  if ($returnvalue) {
8928  return 'Bad string syntax to evaluate (double : char is forbidden): '.$s;
8929  } else {
8930  dol_syslog('Bad string syntax to evaluate (double : char is forbidden): '.$s);
8931  return '';
8932  }
8933  }
8934  if (strpos($s, '`') !== false) {
8935  if ($returnvalue) {
8936  return 'Bad string syntax to evaluate (backtick char is forbidden): '.$s;
8937  } else {
8938  dol_syslog('Bad string syntax to evaluate (backtick char is forbidden): '.$s);
8939  return '';
8940  }
8941  }
8942  if (preg_match('/[^0-9]+\.[^0-9]+/', $s)) { // We refuse . if not between 2 numbers
8943  if ($returnvalue) {
8944  return 'Bad string syntax to evaluate (dot char is forbidden): '.$s;
8945  } else {
8946  dol_syslog('Bad string syntax to evaluate (dot char is forbidden): '.$s);
8947  return '';
8948  }
8949  }
8950 
8951  // We block use of php exec or php file functions
8952  $forbiddenphpstrings = array('$$');
8953  $forbiddenphpstrings = array_merge($forbiddenphpstrings, array('_ENV', '_SESSION', '_COOKIE', '_GET', '_POST', '_REQUEST'));
8954 
8955  $forbiddenphpfunctions = array("exec", "passthru", "shell_exec", "system", "proc_open", "popen", "eval", "dol_eval", "executeCLI", "verifCond", "base64_decode");
8956  $forbiddenphpfunctions = array_merge($forbiddenphpfunctions, array("fopen", "file_put_contents", "fputs", "fputscsv", "fwrite", "fpassthru", "require", "include", "mkdir", "rmdir", "symlink", "touch", "unlink", "umask"));
8957  $forbiddenphpfunctions = array_merge($forbiddenphpfunctions, array("function", "call_user_func"));
8958 
8959  $forbiddenphpregex = 'global\s+\$|\b('.implode('|', $forbiddenphpfunctions).')\b';
8960 
8961  do {
8962  $oldstringtoclean = $s;
8963  $s = str_ireplace($forbiddenphpstrings, '__forbiddenstring__', $s);
8964  $s = preg_replace('/'.$forbiddenphpregex.'/i', '__forbiddenstring__', $s);
8965  //$s = preg_replace('/\$[a-zA-Z0-9_\->\$]+\‍(/i', '', $s); // Remove $function( call and $mycall->mymethod(
8966  } while ($oldstringtoclean != $s);
8967 
8968  if (strpos($s, '__forbiddenstring__') !== false) {
8969  dol_syslog('Bad string syntax to evaluate: '.$s, LOG_WARNING);
8970  if ($returnvalue) {
8971  return 'Bad string syntax to evaluate: '.$s;
8972  } else {
8973  dol_syslog('Bad string syntax to evaluate: '.$s);
8974  return '';
8975  }
8976  }
8977 
8978  //print $s."<br>\n";
8979  if ($returnvalue) {
8980  if ($hideerrors) {
8981  return @eval('return '.$s.';');
8982  } else {
8983  return eval('return '.$s.';');
8984  }
8985  } else {
8986  if ($hideerrors) {
8987  @eval($s);
8988  } else {
8989  eval($s);
8990  }
8991  }
8992 }
8993 
9000 function dol_validElement($element)
9001 {
9002  return (trim($element) != '');
9003 }
9004 
9013 function picto_from_langcode($codelang, $moreatt = '', $notitlealt = 0)
9014 {
9015  if (empty($codelang)) {
9016  return '';
9017  }
9018 
9019  if ($codelang == 'auto') {
9020  return '<span class="fa fa-language"></span>';
9021  }
9022 
9023  $langtocountryflag = array(
9024  'ar_AR' => '',
9025  'ca_ES' => 'catalonia',
9026  'da_DA' => 'dk',
9027  'fr_CA' => 'mq',
9028  'sv_SV' => 'se',
9029  'sw_SW' => 'unknown',
9030  'AQ' => 'unknown',
9031  'CW' => 'unknown',
9032  'IM' => 'unknown',
9033  'JE' => 'unknown',
9034  'MF' => 'unknown',
9035  'BL' => 'unknown',
9036  'SX' => 'unknown'
9037  );
9038 
9039  if (isset($langtocountryflag[$codelang])) {
9040  $flagImage = $langtocountryflag[$codelang];
9041  } else {
9042  $tmparray = explode('_', $codelang);
9043  $flagImage = empty($tmparray[1]) ? $tmparray[0] : $tmparray[1];
9044  }
9045 
9046  return img_picto_common($codelang, 'flags/'.strtolower($flagImage).'.png', $moreatt, 0, $notitlealt);
9047 }
9048 
9056 function getLanguageCodeFromCountryCode($countrycode)
9057 {
9058  global $mysoc;
9059 
9060  if (empty($countrycode)) {
9061  return null;
9062  }
9063 
9064  if (strtoupper($countrycode) == 'MQ') {
9065  return 'fr_CA';
9066  }
9067  if (strtoupper($countrycode) == 'SE') {
9068  return 'sv_SE'; // se_SE is Sami/Sweden, and we want in priority sv_SE for SE country
9069  }
9070  if (strtoupper($countrycode) == 'CH') {
9071  if ($mysoc->country_code == 'FR') {
9072  return 'fr_CH';
9073  }
9074  if ($mysoc->country_code == 'DE') {
9075  return 'de_CH';
9076  }
9077  if ($mysoc->country_code == 'IT') {
9078  return 'it_CH';
9079  }
9080  }
9081 
9082  // Locale list taken from:
9083  // http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3191664/
9084  // list-of-all-locales-and-their-short-codes
9085  $locales = array(
9086  'af-ZA',
9087  'am-ET',
9088  'ar-AE',
9089  'ar-BH',
9090  'ar-DZ',
9091  'ar-EG',
9092  'ar-IQ',
9093  'ar-JO',
9094  'ar-KW',
9095  'ar-LB',
9096  'ar-LY',
9097  'ar-MA',
9098  'ar-OM',
9099  'ar-QA',
9100  'ar-SA',
9101  'ar-SY',
9102  'ar-TN',
9103  'ar-YE',
9104  //'as-IN', // Moved after en-IN
9105  'ba-RU',
9106  'be-BY',
9107  'bg-BG',
9108  'bn-BD',
9109  //'bn-IN', // Moved after en-IN
9110  'bo-CN',
9111  'br-FR',
9112  'ca-ES',
9113  'co-FR',
9114  'cs-CZ',
9115  'cy-GB',
9116  'da-DK',
9117  'de-AT',
9118  'de-CH',
9119  'de-DE',
9120  'de-LI',
9121  'de-LU',
9122  'dv-MV',
9123  'el-GR',
9124  'en-AU',
9125  'en-BZ',
9126  'en-CA',
9127  'en-GB',
9128  'en-IE',
9129  'en-IN',
9130  'as-IN', // as-IN must be after en-IN (en in priority if country is IN)
9131  'bn-IN', // bn-IN must be after en-IN (en in priority if country is IN)
9132  'en-JM',
9133  'en-MY',
9134  'en-NZ',
9135  'en-PH',
9136  'en-SG',
9137  'en-TT',
9138  'en-US',
9139  'en-ZA',
9140  'en-ZW',
9141  'es-AR',
9142  'es-BO',
9143  'es-CL',
9144  'es-CO',
9145  'es-CR',
9146  'es-DO',
9147  'es-EC',
9148  'es-ES',
9149  'es-GT',
9150  'es-HN',
9151  'es-MX',
9152  'es-NI',
9153  'es-PA',
9154  'es-PE',
9155  'es-PR',
9156  'es-PY',
9157  'es-SV',
9158  'es-US',
9159  'es-UY',
9160  'es-VE',
9161  'et-EE',
9162  'eu-ES',
9163  'fa-IR',
9164  'fi-FI',
9165  'fo-FO',
9166  'fr-BE',
9167  'fr-CA',
9168  'fr-CH',
9169  'fr-FR',
9170  'fr-LU',
9171  'fr-MC',
9172  'fy-NL',
9173  'ga-IE',
9174  'gd-GB',
9175  'gl-ES',
9176  'gu-IN',
9177  'he-IL',
9178  'hi-IN',
9179  'hr-BA',
9180  'hr-HR',
9181  'hu-HU',
9182  'hy-AM',
9183  'id-ID',
9184  'ig-NG',
9185  'ii-CN',
9186  'is-IS',
9187  'it-CH',
9188  'it-IT',
9189  'ja-JP',
9190  'ka-GE',
9191  'kk-KZ',
9192  'kl-GL',
9193  'km-KH',
9194  'kn-IN',
9195  'ko-KR',
9196  'ky-KG',
9197  'lb-LU',
9198  'lo-LA',
9199  'lt-LT',
9200  'lv-LV',
9201  'mi-NZ',
9202  'mk-MK',
9203  'ml-IN',
9204  'mn-MN',
9205  'mr-IN',
9206  'ms-BN',
9207  'ms-MY',
9208  'mt-MT',
9209  'nb-NO',
9210  'ne-NP',
9211  'nl-BE',
9212  'nl-NL',
9213  'nn-NO',
9214  'oc-FR',
9215  'or-IN',
9216  'pa-IN',
9217  'pl-PL',
9218  'ps-AF',
9219  'pt-BR',
9220  'pt-PT',
9221  'rm-CH',
9222  'ro-MD',
9223  'ro-RO',
9224  'ru-RU',
9225  'rw-RW',
9226  'sa-IN',
9227  'se-FI',
9228  'se-NO',
9229  'se-SE',
9230  'si-LK',
9231  'sk-SK',
9232  'sl-SI',
9233  'sq-AL',
9234  'sv-FI',
9235  'sv-SE',
9236  'sw-KE',
9237  'ta-IN',
9238  'te-IN',
9239  'th-TH',
9240  'tk-TM',
9241  'tn-ZA',
9242  'tr-TR',
9243  'tt-RU',
9244  'ug-CN',
9245  'uk-UA',
9246  'ur-PK',
9247  'vi-VN',
9248  'wo-SN',
9249  'xh-ZA',
9250  'yo-NG',
9251  'zh-CN',
9252  'zh-HK',
9253  'zh-MO',
9254  'zh-SG',
9255  'zh-TW',
9256  'zu-ZA',
9257  );
9258 
9259  $buildprimarykeytotest = strtolower($countrycode).'-'.strtoupper($countrycode);
9260  if (in_array($buildprimarykeytotest, $locales)) {
9261  return strtolower($countrycode).'_'.strtoupper($countrycode);
9262  }
9263 
9264  if (function_exists('locale_get_primary_language') && function_exists('locale_get_region')) { // Need extension php-intl
9265  foreach ($locales as $locale) {
9266  $locale_language = locale_get_primary_language($locale);
9267  $locale_region = locale_get_region($locale);
9268  if (strtoupper($countrycode) == $locale_region) {
9269  //var_dump($locale.' - '.$locale_language.' - '.$locale_region);
9270  return strtolower($locale_language).'_'.strtoupper($locale_region);
9271  }
9272  }
9273  } else {
9274  dol_syslog("Warning Exention php-intl is not available", LOG_WARNING);
9275  }
9276 
9277  return null;
9278 }
9279 
9310 function complete_head_from_modules($conf, $langs, $object, &$head, &$h, $type, $mode = 'add', $filterorigmodule = '')
9311 {
9312  global $hookmanager, $db;
9313 
9314  if (isset($conf->modules_parts['tabs'][$type]) && is_array($conf->modules_parts['tabs'][$type])) {
9315  foreach ($conf->modules_parts['tabs'][$type] as $value) {
9316  $values = explode(':', $value);
9317 
9318  $reg = array();
9319  if ($mode == 'add' && !preg_match('/^\-/', $values[1])) {
9320  if (count($values) == 6) {
9321  // new declaration with permissions:
9322  // $value='objecttype:+tabname1:Title1:langfile@mymodule:$user->rights->mymodule->read:/mymodule/mynewtab1.php?id=__ID__'
9323  // $value='objecttype:+tabname1:Title1,class,pathfile,method:langfile@mymodule:$user->rights->mymodule->read:/mymodule/mynewtab1.php?id=__ID__'
9324  if ($values[0] != $type) {
9325  continue;
9326  }
9327 
9328  if (verifCond($values[4])) {
9329  if ($values[3]) {
9330  if ($filterorigmodule) { // If a filter of module origin has been requested
9331  if (strpos($values[3], '@')) { // This is an external module
9332  if ($filterorigmodule != 'external') {
9333  continue;
9334  }
9335  } else { // This looks a core module
9336  if ($filterorigmodule != 'core') {
9337  continue;
9338  }
9339  }
9340  }
9341  $langs->load($values[3]);
9342  }
9343  if (preg_match('/SUBSTITUTION_([^_]+)/i', $values[2], $reg)) {
9344  // If label is "SUBSTITUION_..."
9345  $substitutionarray = array();
9346  complete_substitutions_array($substitutionarray, $langs, $object, array('needforkey'=>$values[2]));
9347  $label = make_substitutions($reg[1], $substitutionarray);
9348  } else {
9349  // If label is "Label,Class,File,Method", we call the method to show content inside the badge
9350  $labeltemp = explode(',', $values[2]);
9351  $label = $langs->trans($labeltemp[0]);
9352 
9353  if (!empty($labeltemp[1]) && is_object($object) && !empty($object->id)) {
9354  dol_include_once($labeltemp[2]);
9355  $classtoload = $labeltemp[1];
9356  if (class_exists($classtoload)) {
9357  $obj = new $classtoload($db);
9358  $function = $labeltemp[3];
9359  if ($obj && $function && method_exists($obj, $function)) {
9360  $nbrec = $obj->$function($object->id, $obj);
9361  $label .= '<span class="badge marginleftonlyshort">'.$nbrec.'</span>';
9362  }
9363  }
9364  }
9365  }
9366 
9367  $head[$h][0] = dol_buildpath(preg_replace('/__ID__/i', ((is_object($object) && !empty($object->id)) ? $object->id : ''), $values[5]), 1);
9368  $head[$h][1] = $label;
9369  $head[$h][2] = str_replace('+', '', $values[1]);
9370  $h++;
9371  }
9372  } elseif (count($values) == 5) { // case deprecated
9373  dol_syslog('Passing 5 values in tabs module_parts is deprecated. Please update to 6 with permissions.', LOG_WARNING);
9374 
9375  if ($values[0] != $type) {
9376  continue;
9377  }
9378  if ($values[3]) {
9379  if ($filterorigmodule) { // If a filter of module origin has been requested
9380  if (strpos($values[3], '@')) { // This is an external module
9381  if ($filterorigmodule != 'external') {
9382  continue;
9383  }
9384  } else { // This looks a core module
9385  if ($filterorigmodule != 'core') {
9386  continue;
9387  }
9388  }
9389  }
9390  $langs->load($values[3]);
9391  }
9392  if (preg_match('/SUBSTITUTION_([^_]+)/i', $values[2], $reg)) {
9393  $substitutionarray = array();
9394  complete_substitutions_array($substitutionarray, $langs, $object, array('needforkey'=>$values[2]));
9395  $label = make_substitutions($reg[1], $substitutionarray);
9396  } else {
9397  $label = $langs->trans($values[2]);
9398  }
9399 
9400  $head[$h][0] = dol_buildpath(preg_replace('/__ID__/i', ((is_object($object) && !empty($object->id)) ? $object->id : ''), $values[4]), 1);
9401  $head[$h][1] = $label;
9402  $head[$h][2] = str_replace('+', '', $values[1]);
9403  $h++;
9404  }
9405  } elseif ($mode == 'remove' && preg_match('/^\-/', $values[1])) {
