9406  if ($values[0] != $type) {
9407  continue;
9408  }
9409  $tabname = str_replace('-', '', $values[1]);
9410  foreach ($head as $key => $val) {
9411  $condition = (!empty($values[3]) ? verifCond($values[3]) : 1);
9412  //var_dump($key.' - '.$tabname.' - '.$head[$key][2].' - '.$values[3].' - '.$condition);
9413  if ($head[$key][2] == $tabname && $condition) {
9414  unset($head[$key]);
9415  break;
9416  }
9417  }
9418  }
9419  }
9420  }
9421 
9422  // No need to make a return $head. Var is modified as a reference
9423  if (!empty($hookmanager)) {
9424  $parameters = array('object' => $object, 'mode' => $mode, 'head' => &$head, 'filterorigmodule' => $filterorigmodule);
9425  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('completeTabsHead', $parameters);
9426  if ($reshook > 0) { // Hook ask to replace completely the array
9427  $head = $hookmanager->resArray;
9428  } else { // Hook
9429  $head = array_merge($head, $hookmanager->resArray);
9430  }
9431  $h = count($head);
9432  }
9433 }
9434 
9446 function printCommonFooter($zone = 'private')
9447 {
9448  global $conf, $hookmanager, $user, $debugbar;
9449  global $action;
9450  global $micro_start_time;
9451 
9452  if ($zone == 'private') {
9453  print "\n".'<!-- Common footer for private page -->'."\n";
9454  } else {
9455  print "\n".'<!-- Common footer for public page -->'."\n";
9456  }
9457 
9458  // A div to store page_y POST parameter so we can read it using javascript
9459  print "\n<!-- A div to store page_y POST parameter -->\n";
9460  print '<div id="page_y" style="display: none;">'.(GETPOST('page_y') ? GETPOST('page_y') : '').'</div>'."\n";
9461 
9462  $parameters = array();
9463  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printCommonFooter', $parameters); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
9464  if (empty($reshook)) {
9465  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_HTML_FOOTER)) {
9466  print $conf->global->MAIN_HTML_FOOTER."\n";
9467  }
9468 
9469  print "\n";
9470  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
9471  print "\n<!-- A script section to add menuhider handler on backoffice, manage focus and madatory fields, tuning info, ... -->\n";
9472  print '<script>'."\n";
9473  print 'jQuery(document).ready(function() {'."\n";
9474 
9475  if ($zone == 'private' && empty($conf->dol_use_jmobile)) {
9476  print "\n";
9477  print '/* JS CODE TO ENABLE to manage handler to switch left menu page (menuhider) */'."\n";
9478  print 'jQuery("li.menuhider").click(function(event) {';
9479  print ' if (!$( "body" ).hasClass( "sidebar-collapse" )){ event.preventDefault(); }'."\n";
9480  print ' console.log("We click on .menuhider");'."\n";
9481  print ' $("body").toggleClass("sidebar-collapse")'."\n";
9482  print '});'."\n";
9483  }
9484 
9485  // Management of focus and mandatory for fields
9486  if ($action == 'create' || $action == 'edit' || (empty($action) && (preg_match('/new\.php/', $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"])))) {
9487  print '/* JS CODE TO ENABLE to manage focus and mandatory form fields */'."\n";
9488  $relativepathstring = $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"];
9489  // Clean $relativepathstring
9490  if (constant('DOL_URL_ROOT')) {
9491  $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^'.preg_quote(constant('DOL_URL_ROOT'), '/').'/', '', $relativepathstring);
9492  }
9493  $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^\//', '', $relativepathstring);
9494  $relativepathstring = preg_replace('/^custom\//', '', $relativepathstring);
9495  //$tmpqueryarraywehave = explode('&', dol_string_nohtmltag($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']));
9496  if (!empty($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['focus'])) {
9497  foreach ($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['focus'] as $defkey => $defval) {
9498  $qualified = 0;
9499  if ($defkey != '_noquery_') {
9500  $tmpqueryarraytohave = explode('&', $defkey);
9501  $foundintru = 0;
9502  foreach ($tmpqueryarraytohave as $tmpquerytohave) {
9503  $tmpquerytohaveparam = explode('=', $tmpquerytohave);
9504  //print "console.log('".$tmpquerytohaveparam[0]." ".$tmpquerytohaveparam[1]." ".GETPOST($tmpquerytohaveparam[0])."');";
9505  if (!GETPOSTISSET($tmpquerytohaveparam[0]) || ($tmpquerytohaveparam[1] != GETPOST($tmpquerytohaveparam[0]))) {
9506  $foundintru = 1;
9507  }
9508  }
9509  if (!$foundintru) {
9510  $qualified = 1;
9511  }
9512  //var_dump($defkey.'-'.$qualified);
9513  } else {
9514  $qualified = 1;
9515  }
9516 
9517  if ($qualified) {
9518  foreach ($defval as $paramkey => $paramval) {
9519  // Set focus on field
9520  print 'jQuery("input[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").focus();'."\n";
9521  print 'jQuery("textarea[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").focus();'."\n";
9522  print 'jQuery("select[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").focus();'."\n"; // Not really usefull, but we keep it in case of.
9523  }
9524  }
9525  }
9526  }
9527  if (!empty($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['mandatory'])) {
9528  foreach ($user->default_values[$relativepathstring]['mandatory'] as $defkey => $defval) {
9529  $qualified = 0;
9530  if ($defkey != '_noquery_') {
9531  $tmpqueryarraytohave = explode('&', $defkey);
9532  $foundintru = 0;
9533  foreach ($tmpqueryarraytohave as $tmpquerytohave) {
9534  $tmpquerytohaveparam = explode('=', $tmpquerytohave);
9535  //print "console.log('".$tmpquerytohaveparam[0]." ".$tmpquerytohaveparam[1]." ".GETPOST($tmpquerytohaveparam[0])."');";
9536  if (!GETPOSTISSET($tmpquerytohaveparam[0]) || ($tmpquerytohaveparam[1] != GETPOST($tmpquerytohaveparam[0]))) {
9537  $foundintru = 1;
9538  }
9539  }
9540  if (!$foundintru) {
9541  $qualified = 1;
9542  }
9543  //var_dump($defkey.'-'.$qualified);
9544  } else {
9545  $qualified = 1;
9546  }
9547 
9548  if ($qualified) {
9549  foreach ($defval as $paramkey => $paramval) {
9550  // Add property 'required' on input
9551  print 'jQuery("input[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").prop(\'required\',true);'."\n";
9552  print 'jQuery("textarea[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").prop(\'required\',true);'."\n";
9553  print '// required on a select works only if key is "", so we add the required attributes but also we reset the key -1 or 0 to an empty string'."\n";
9554  print 'jQuery("select[name=\''.$paramkey.'\']").prop(\'required\',true);'."\n";
9555  print 'jQuery("select[name=\''.$paramkey.'\'] option[value=\'-1\']").prop(\'value\', \'\');'."\n";
9556  print 'jQuery("select[name=\''.$paramkey.'\'] option[value=\'0\']").prop(\'value\', \'\');'."\n";
9557 
9558  // Add 'field required' class on closest td for all input elements : input, textarea and select
9559  print 'jQuery(":input[name=\'' . $paramkey . '\']").closest("tr").find("td:first").addClass("fieldrequired");' . "\n";
9560  }
9561  }
9562  }
9563  }
9564  }
9565 
9566  print '});'."\n";
9567 
9568  // End of tuning
9569  if (!empty($_SERVER['MAIN_SHOW_TUNING_INFO']) || !empty($conf->global->MAIN_SHOW_TUNING_INFO)) {
9570  print "\n";
9571  print "/* JS CODE TO ENABLE to add memory info */\n";
9572  print 'window.console && console.log("';
9573  if (!empty($conf->global->MEMCACHED_SERVER)) {
9574  print 'MEMCACHED_SERVER='.$conf->global->MEMCACHED_SERVER.' - ';
9575  }
9576  print 'MAIN_OPTIMIZE_SPEED='.(isset($conf->global->MAIN_OPTIMIZE_SPEED) ? $conf->global->MAIN_OPTIMIZE_SPEED : 'off');
9577  if (!empty($micro_start_time)) { // Works only if MAIN_SHOW_TUNING_INFO is defined at $_SERVER level. Not in global variable.
9578  $micro_end_time = microtime(true);
9579  print ' - Build time: '.ceil(1000 * ($micro_end_time - $micro_start_time)).' ms';
9580  }
9581 
9582  if (function_exists("memory_get_usage")) {
9583  print ' - Mem: '.memory_get_usage(); // Do not use true here, it seems it takes the peak amount
9584  }
9585  if (function_exists("memory_get_peak_usage")) {
9586  print ' - Real mem peak: '.memory_get_peak_usage(true);
9587  }
9588  if (function_exists("zend_loader_file_encoded")) {
9589  print ' - Zend encoded file: '.(zend_loader_file_encoded() ? 'yes' : 'no');
9590  }
9591  print '");'."\n";
9592  }
9593 
9594  print "\n".'</script>'."\n";
9595 
9596  // Google Analytics
9597  // TODO Add a hook here
9598  if (!empty($conf->google->enabled) && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_GOOGLE_AN_ID)) {
9599  $tmptagarray = explode(',', $conf->global->MAIN_GOOGLE_AN_ID);
9600  foreach ($tmptagarray as $tmptag) {
9601  print "\n";
9602  print "<!-- JS CODE TO ENABLE for google analtics tag -->\n";
9603  print "
9604  <!-- Global site tag (gtag.js) - Google Analytics -->
9605  <script async src=\"https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=".trim($tmptag)."\"></script>
9606  <script>
9607  window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
9608  function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);}
9609  gtag('js', new Date());
9610 
9611  gtag('config', '".trim($tmptag)."');
9612  </script>";
9613  print "\n";
9614  }
9615  }
9616  }
9617 
9618  // Add Xdebug coverage of code
9619  if (defined('XDEBUGCOVERAGE')) {
9620  print_r(xdebug_get_code_coverage());
9621  }
9622 
9623  // Add DebugBar data
9624  if (!empty($user->rights->debugbar->read) && is_object($debugbar)) {
9625  $debugbar['time']->stopMeasure('pageaftermaster');
9626  print '<!-- Output debugbar data -->'."\n";
9627  $renderer = $debugbar->getRenderer();
9628  print $debugbar->getRenderer()->render();
9629  } elseif (count($conf->logbuffer)) { // If there is some logs in buffer to show
9630  print "\n";
9631  print "<!-- Start of log output\n";
9632  //print '<div class="hidden">'."\n";
9633  foreach ($conf->logbuffer as $logline) {
9634  print $logline."<br>\n";
9635  }
9636  //print '</div>'."\n";
9637  print "End of log output -->\n";
9638  }
9639  }
9640 }
9641 
9651 function dolExplodeIntoArray($string, $delimiter = ';', $kv = '=')
9652 {
9653  if ($a = explode($delimiter, $string)) {
9654  $ka = array();
9655  foreach ($a as $s) { // each part
9656  if ($s) {
9657  if ($pos = strpos($s, $kv)) { // key/value delimiter
9658  $ka[trim(substr($s, 0, $pos))] = trim(substr($s, $pos + strlen($kv)));
9659  } else { // key delimiter not found
9660  $ka[] = trim($s);
9661  }
9662  }
9663  }
9664  return $ka;
9665  }
9666  return array();
9667 }
9668 
9669 
9676 function dol_set_focus($selector)
9677 {
9678  print "\n".'<!-- Set focus onto a specific field -->'."\n";
9679  print '<script>jQuery(document).ready(function() { jQuery("'.dol_escape_js($selector).'").focus(); });</script>'."\n";
9680 }
9681 
9682 
9690 function dol_getmypid()
9691 {
9692  if (!function_exists('getmypid')) {
9693  return mt_rand(99900000, 99965535);
9694  } else {
9695  return getmypid(); // May be a number on 64 bits (depending on OS)
9696  }
9697 }
9698 
9699 
9717 function natural_search($fields, $value, $mode = 0, $nofirstand = 0)
9718 {
9719  global $db, $langs;
9720 
9721  $value = trim($value);
9722 
9723  if ($mode == 0) {
9724  $value = preg_replace('/\*/', '%', $value); // Replace * with %
9725  }
9726  if ($mode == 1) {
9727  $value = preg_replace('/([<>=]+)\s+([0-9'.preg_quote($langs->trans("DecimalSeparator"), '/').'\-])/', '\1\2', $value); // Clean string '< 10' into '<10' so we can the explode on space to get all tests to do
9728  }
9729 
9730  $value = preg_replace('/\s*\|\s*/', '|', $value);
9731 
9732  $crits = explode(' ', $value);
9733  $res = '';
9734  if (!is_array($fields)) {
9735  $fields = array($fields);
9736  }
9737 
9738  $j = 0;
9739  foreach ($crits as $crit) {
9740  $crit = trim($crit);
9741  $i = 0;
9742  $i2 = 0;
9743  $newres = '';
9744  foreach ($fields as $field) {
9745  if ($mode == 1) {
9746  $operator = '=';
9747  $newcrit = preg_replace('/([<>=]+)/', '', $crit);
9748 
9749  $reg = array();
9750  preg_match('/([<>=]+)/', $crit, $reg);
9751  if (!empty($reg[1])) {
9752  $operator = $reg[1];
9753  }
9754  if ($newcrit != '') {
9755  $numnewcrit = price2num($newcrit);
9756  if (is_numeric($numnewcrit)) {
9757  $newres .= ($i2 > 0 ? ' OR ' : '').$field.' '.$operator.' '.((float) $numnewcrit); // should be a numeric
9758  } else {
9759  $newres .= ($i2 > 0 ? ' OR ' : '').'1 = 2'; // force false
9760  }
9761  $i2++; // a criteria was added to string
9762  }
9763  } elseif ($mode == 2 || $mode == -2) {
9764  $crit = preg_replace('/[^0-9,]/', '', $crit); // ID are always integer
9765  $newres .= ($i2 > 0 ? ' OR ' : '').$field." ".($mode == -2 ? 'NOT ' : '');
9766  $newres .= $crit ? "IN (".$db->sanitize($db->escape($crit)).")" : "IN (0)";
9767  if ($mode == -2) {
9768  $newres .= ' OR '.$field.' IS NULL';
9769  }
9770  $i2++; // a criteria was added to string
9771  } elseif ($mode == 3 || $mode == -3) {
9772  $tmparray = explode(',', $crit);
9773  if (count($tmparray)) {
9774  $listofcodes = '';
9775  foreach ($tmparray as $val) {
9776  $val = trim($val);
9777  if ($val) {
9778  $listofcodes .= ($listofcodes ? ',' : '');
9779  $listofcodes .= "'".$db->escape($val)."'";
9780  }
9781  }
9782  $newres .= ($i2 > 0 ? ' OR ' : '').$field." ".($mode == -3 ? 'NOT ' : '')."IN (".$db->sanitize($listofcodes, 1).")";
9783  $i2++; // a criteria was added to string
9784  }
9785  if ($mode == -3) {
9786  $newres .= ' OR '.$field.' IS NULL';
9787  }
9788  } elseif ($mode == 4) {
9789  $tmparray = explode(',', $crit);
9790  if (count($tmparray)) {
9791  $listofcodes = '';
9792  foreach ($tmparray as $val) {
9793  $val = trim($val);
9794  if ($val) {
9795  $newres .= ($i2 > 0 ? " OR (" : "(").$field." LIKE '".$db->escape($val).",%'";
9796  $newres .= ' OR '.$field." = '".$db->escape($val)."'";
9797  $newres .= ' OR '.$field." LIKE '%,".$db->escape($val)."'";
9798  $newres .= ' OR '.$field." LIKE '%,".$db->escape($val).",%'";
9799  $newres .= ')';
9800  $i2++;
9801  }
9802  }
9803  }
9804  } else // $mode=0
9805  {
9806  $tmpcrits = explode('|', $crit);
9807  $i3 = 0;
9808  foreach ($tmpcrits as $tmpcrit) {
9809  if ($tmpcrit !== '0' && empty($tmpcrit)) {
9810  continue;
9811  }
9812 
9813  $newres .= (($i2 > 0 || $i3 > 0) ? ' OR ' : '');
9814 
9815  if (preg_match('/\.(id|rowid)$/', $field)) { // Special case for rowid that is sometimes a ref so used as a search field
9816  $newres .= $field." = ".(is_numeric(trim($tmpcrit)) ? ((float) trim($tmpcrit)) : '0');
9817  } else {
9818  $tmpcrit = trim($tmpcrit);
9819  $tmpcrit2 = $tmpcrit;
9820  $tmpbefore = '%';
9821  $tmpafter = '%';
9822  if (preg_match('/^!/', $tmpcrit)) {
9823  $newres .= $field." NOT LIKE '"; // ! as exclude character
9824  $tmpcrit2 = preg_replace('/^!/', '', $tmpcrit2);
9825  } else $newres .= $field." LIKE '";
9826 
9827  if (preg_match('/^[\^\$]/', $tmpcrit)) {
9828  $tmpbefore = '';
9829  $tmpcrit2 = preg_replace('/^[\^\$]/', '', $tmpcrit2);
9830  }
9831  if (preg_match('/[\^\$]$/', $tmpcrit)) {
9832  $tmpafter = '';
9833  $tmpcrit2 = preg_replace('/[\^\$]$/', '', $tmpcrit2);
9834  }
9835  $newres .= $tmpbefore;
9836  $newres .= $db->escape($tmpcrit2);
9837  $newres .= $tmpafter;
9838  $newres .= "'";
9839  if ($tmpcrit2 == '') {
9840  $newres .= " OR ".$field." IS NULL";
9841  }
9842  }
9843 
9844  $i3++;
9845  }
9846  $i2++; // a criteria was added to string
9847  }
9848  $i++;
9849  }
9850  if ($newres) {
9851  $res = $res.($res ? ' AND ' : '').($i2 > 1 ? '(' : '').$newres.($i2 > 1 ? ')' : '');
9852  }
9853  $j++;
9854  }
9855  $res = ($nofirstand ? "" : " AND ")."(".$res.")";
9856  //print 'xx'.$res.'yy';
9857  return $res;
9858 }
9859 
9866 function showDirectDownloadLink($object)
9867 {
9868  global $conf, $langs;
9869 
9870  $out = '';
9871  $url = $object->getLastMainDocLink($object->element);
9872 
9873  $out .= img_picto($langs->trans("PublicDownloadLinkDesc"), 'globe').' <span class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans("DirectDownloadLink").'</span><br>';
9874  if ($url) {
9875  $out .= '<div class="urllink"><input type="text" id="directdownloadlink" class="quatrevingtpercent" value="'.$url.'"></div>';
9876  $out .= ajax_autoselect("directdownloadlink", 0);
9877  } else {
9878  $out .= '<div class="urllink">'.$langs->trans("FileNotShared").'</div>';
9879  }
9880 
9881  return $out;
9882 }
9883 
9892 function getImageFileNameForSize($file, $extName, $extImgTarget = '')
9893 {
9894  $dirName = dirname($file);
9895  if ($dirName == '.') {
9896  $dirName = '';
9897  }
9898 
9899  $fileName = preg_replace('/(\.gif|\.jpeg|\.jpg|\.png|\.bmp|\.webp)$/i', '', $file); // We remove extension, whatever is its case
9900  $fileName = basename($fileName);
9901 
9902  if (empty($extImgTarget)) {
9903  $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.jpg$/i', $file) ? '.jpg' : '');
9904  }
9905  if (empty($extImgTarget)) {
9906  $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.jpeg$/i', $file) ? '.jpeg' : '');
9907  }
9908  if (empty($extImgTarget)) {
9909  $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.gif$/i', $file) ? '.gif' : '');
9910  }
9911  if (empty($extImgTarget)) {
9912  $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.png$/i', $file) ? '.png' : '');
9913  }
9914  if (empty($extImgTarget)) {
9915  $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.bmp$/i', $file) ? '.bmp' : '');
9916  }
9917  if (empty($extImgTarget)) {
9918  $extImgTarget = (preg_match('/\.webp$/i', $file) ? '.webp' : '');
9919  }
9920 
9921  if (!$extImgTarget) {
9922  return $file;
9923  }
9924 
9925  $subdir = '';
9926  if ($extName) {
9927  $subdir = 'thumbs/';
9928  }
9929 
9930  return ($dirName ? $dirName.'/' : '').$subdir.$fileName.$extName.$extImgTarget; // New filename for thumb
9931 }
9932 
9933 
9943 function getAdvancedPreviewUrl($modulepart, $relativepath, $alldata = 0, $param = '')
9944 {
9945  global $conf, $langs;
9946 
9947  if (empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
9948  return '';
9949  }
9950 
9951  $isAllowedForPreview = dolIsAllowedForPreview($relativepath);
9952 
9953  if ($alldata == 1) {
9954  if ($isAllowedForPreview) {
9955  return array('target'=>'_blank', 'css'=>'documentpreview', 'url'=>DOL_URL_ROOT.'/document.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&attachment=0&file='.urlencode($relativepath).($param ? '&'.$param : ''), 'mime'=>dol_mimetype($relativepath));
9956  } else {
9957  return array();
9958  }
9959  }
9960 
9961  // old behavior, return a string
9962  if ($isAllowedForPreview) {
9963  return 'javascript:document_preview(\''.dol_escape_js(DOL_URL_ROOT.'/document.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&attachment=0&file='.urlencode($relativepath).($param ? '&'.$param : '')).'\', \''.dol_mimetype($relativepath).'\', \''.dol_escape_js($langs->trans('Preview')).'\')';
9964  } else {
9965  return '';
9966  }
9967 }
9968 
9969 
9978 function ajax_autoselect($htmlname, $addlink = '', $textonlink = 'Link')
9979 {
9980  global $langs;
9981  $out = '<script>
9982  jQuery(document).ready(function () {
9983  jQuery("'.((strpos($htmlname, '.') === 0 ? '' : '#').$htmlname).'").click(function() { jQuery(this).select(); } );
9984  });
9985  </script>';
9986  if ($addlink) {
9987  if ($textonlink === 'image') {
9988  $out .= ' <a href="'.$addlink.'" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">'.img_picto('', 'globe').'</a>';
9989  } else {
9990  $out .= ' <a href="'.$addlink.'" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">'.$langs->trans("Link").'</a>';
9991  }
9992  }
9993  return $out;
9994 }
9995 
10003 function dolIsAllowedForPreview($file)
10004 {
10005  global $conf;
10006 
10007  // Check .noexe extension in filename
10008  if (preg_match('/\.noexe$/i', $file)) {
10009  return 0;
10010  }
10011 
10012  // Check mime types
10013  $mime_preview = array('bmp', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif', 'tiff', 'pdf', 'plain', 'css', 'webp');
10014  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_ALLOW_SVG_FILES_AS_IMAGES)) {
10015  $mime_preview[] = 'svg+xml';
10016  }
10017  //$mime_preview[]='vnd.oasis.opendocument.presentation';
10018  //$mime_preview[]='archive';
10019  $num_mime = array_search(dol_mimetype($file, '', 1), $mime_preview);
10020  if ($num_mime !== false) {
10021  return 1;
10022  }
10023 
10024  // By default, not allowed for preview
10025  return 0;
10026 }
10027 
10028 
10038 function dol_mimetype($file, $default = 'application/octet-stream', $mode = 0)
10039 {
10040  $mime = $default;
10041  $imgmime = 'other.png';
10042  $famime = 'file-o';
10043  $srclang = '';
10044 
10045  $tmpfile = preg_replace('/\.noexe$/', '', $file);
10046 
10047  // Plain text files
10048  if (preg_match('/\.txt$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10049  $mime = 'text/plain';
10050  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10051  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10052  }
10053  if (preg_match('/\.rtx$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10054  $mime = 'text/richtext';
10055  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10056  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10057  }
10058  if (preg_match('/\.csv$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10059  $mime = 'text/csv';
10060  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10061  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10062  }
10063  if (preg_match('/\.tsv$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10064  $mime = 'text/tab-separated-values';
10065  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10066  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10067  }
10068  if (preg_match('/\.(cf|conf|log)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10069  $mime = 'text/plain';
10070  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10071  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10072  }
10073  if (preg_match('/\.ini$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10074  $mime = 'text/plain';
10075  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10076  $srclang = 'ini';
10077  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10078  }
10079  if (preg_match('/\.md$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10080  $mime = 'text/plain';
10081  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10082  $srclang = 'md';
10083  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10084  }
10085  if (preg_match('/\.css$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10086  $mime = 'text/css';
10087  $imgmime = 'css.png';
10088  $srclang = 'css';
10089  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10090  }
10091  if (preg_match('/\.lang$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10092  $mime = 'text/plain';
10093  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10094  $srclang = 'lang';
10095  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10096  }
10097  // Certificate files
10098  if (preg_match('/\.(crt|cer|key|pub)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10099  $mime = 'text/plain';
10100  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10101  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10102  }
10103  // XML based (HTML/XML/XAML)
10104  if (preg_match('/\.(html|htm|shtml)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10105  $mime = 'text/html';
10106  $imgmime = 'html.png';
10107  $srclang = 'html';
10108  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10109  }
10110  if (preg_match('/\.(xml|xhtml)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10111  $mime = 'text/xml';
10112  $imgmime = 'other.png';
10113  $srclang = 'xml';
10114  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10115  }
10116  if (preg_match('/\.xaml$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10117  $mime = 'text/xml';
10118  $imgmime = 'other.png';
10119  $srclang = 'xaml';
10120  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10121  }
10122  // Languages
10123  if (preg_match('/\.bas$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10124  $mime = 'text/plain';
10125  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10126  $srclang = 'bas';
10127  $famime = 'file-code-o';
10128  }
10129  if (preg_match('/\.(c)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10130  $mime = 'text/plain';
10131  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10132  $srclang = 'c';
10133  $famime = 'file-code-o';
10134  }
10135  if (preg_match('/\.(cpp)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10136  $mime = 'text/plain';
10137  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10138  $srclang = 'cpp';
10139  $famime = 'file-code-o';
10140  }
10141  if (preg_match('/\.cs$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10142  $mime = 'text/plain';
10143  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10144  $srclang = 'cs';
10145  $famime = 'file-code-o';
10146  }
10147  if (preg_match('/\.(h)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10148  $mime = 'text/plain';
10149  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10150  $srclang = 'h';
10151  $famime = 'file-code-o';
10152  }
10153  if (preg_match('/\.(java|jsp)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10154  $mime = 'text/plain';
10155  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10156  $srclang = 'java';
10157  $famime = 'file-code-o';
10158  }
10159  if (preg_match('/\.php([0-9]{1})?$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10160  $mime = 'text/plain';
10161  $imgmime = 'php.png';
10162  $srclang = 'php';
10163  $famime = 'file-code-o';
10164  }
10165  if (preg_match('/\.phtml$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10166  $mime = 'text/plain';
10167  $imgmime = 'php.png';
10168  $srclang = 'php';
10169  $famime = 'file-code-o';
10170  }
10171  if (preg_match('/\.(pl|pm)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10172  $mime = 'text/plain';
10173  $imgmime = 'pl.png';
10174  $srclang = 'perl';
10175  $famime = 'file-code-o';
10176  }
10177  if (preg_match('/\.sql$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10178  $mime = 'text/plain';
10179  $imgmime = 'text.png';
10180  $srclang = 'sql';
10181  $famime = 'file-code-o';
10182  }
10183  if (preg_match('/\.js$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10184  $mime = 'text/x-javascript';
10185  $imgmime = 'jscript.png';
10186  $srclang = 'js';
10187  $famime = 'file-code-o';
10188  }
10189  // Open office
10190  if (preg_match('/\.odp$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10191  $mime = 'application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.presentation';
10192  $imgmime = 'ooffice.png';
10193  $famime = 'file-powerpoint-o';
10194  }
10195  if (preg_match('/\.ods$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10196  $mime = 'application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.spreadsheet';
10197  $imgmime = 'ooffice.png';
10198  $famime = 'file-excel-o';
10199  }
10200  if (preg_match('/\.odt$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10201  $mime = 'application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.text';
10202  $imgmime = 'ooffice.png';
10203  $famime = 'file-word-o';
10204  }
10205  // MS Office
10206  if (preg_match('/\.mdb$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10207  $mime = 'application/msaccess';
10208  $imgmime = 'mdb.png';
10209  $famime = 'file-o';
10210  }
10211  if (preg_match('/\.doc[xm]?$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10212  $mime = 'application/msword';
10213  $imgmime = 'doc.png';
10214  $famime = 'file-word-o';
10215  }
10216  if (preg_match('/\.dot[xm]?$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10217  $mime = 'application/msword';
10218  $imgmime = 'doc.png';
10219  $famime = 'file-word-o';
10220  }
10221  if (preg_match('/\.xlt(x)?$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10222  $mime = 'application/vnd.ms-excel';
10223  $imgmime = 'xls.png';
10224  $famime = 'file-excel-o';
10225  }
10226  if (preg_match('/\.xla(m)?$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10227  $mime = 'application/vnd.ms-excel';
10228  $imgmime = 'xls.png';
10229  $famime = 'file-excel-o';
10230  }
10231  if (preg_match('/\.xls$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10232  $mime = 'application/vnd.ms-excel';
10233  $imgmime = 'xls.png';
10234  $famime = 'file-excel-o';
10235  }
10236  if (preg_match('/\.xls[bmx]$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10237  $mime = 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet';
10238  $imgmime = 'xls.png';
10239  $famime = 'file-excel-o';
10240  }
10241  if (preg_match('/\.pps[mx]?$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10242  $mime = 'application/vnd.ms-powerpoint';
10243  $imgmime = 'ppt.png';
10244  $famime = 'file-powerpoint-o';
10245  }
10246  if (preg_match('/\.ppt[mx]?$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10247  $mime = 'application/x-mspowerpoint';
10248  $imgmime = 'ppt.png';
10249  $famime = 'file-powerpoint-o';
10250  }
10251  // Other
10252  if (preg_match('/\.pdf$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10253  $mime = 'application/pdf';
10254  $imgmime = 'pdf.png';
10255  $famime = 'file-pdf-o';
10256  }
10257  // Scripts
10258  if (preg_match('/\.bat$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10259  $mime = 'text/x-bat';
10260  $imgmime = 'script.png';
10261  $srclang = 'dos';
10262  $famime = 'file-code-o';
10263  }
10264  if (preg_match('/\.sh$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10265  $mime = 'text/x-sh';
10266  $imgmime = 'script.png';
10267  $srclang = 'bash';
10268  $famime = 'file-code-o';
10269  }
10270  if (preg_match('/\.ksh$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10271  $mime = 'text/x-ksh';
10272  $imgmime = 'script.png';
10273  $srclang = 'bash';
10274  $famime = 'file-code-o';
10275  }
10276  if (preg_match('/\.bash$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10277  $mime = 'text/x-bash';
10278  $imgmime = 'script.png';
10279  $srclang = 'bash';
10280  $famime = 'file-code-o';
10281  }
10282  // Images
10283  if (preg_match('/\.ico$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10284  $mime = 'image/x-icon';
10285  $imgmime = 'image.png';
10286  $famime = 'file-image-o';
10287  }
10288  if (preg_match('/\.(jpg|jpeg)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10289  $mime = 'image/jpeg';
10290  $imgmime = 'image.png';
10291  $famime = 'file-image-o';
10292  }
10293  if (preg_match('/\.png$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10294  $mime = 'image/png';
10295  $imgmime = 'image.png';
10296  $famime = 'file-image-o';
10297  }
10298  if (preg_match('/\.gif$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10299  $mime = 'image/gif';
10300  $imgmime = 'image.png';
10301  $famime = 'file-image-o';
10302  }
10303  if (preg_match('/\.bmp$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10304  $mime = 'image/bmp';
10305  $imgmime = 'image.png';
10306  $famime = 'file-image-o';
10307  }
10308  if (preg_match('/\.(tif|tiff)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10309  $mime = 'image/tiff';
10310  $imgmime = 'image.png';
10311  $famime = 'file-image-o';
10312  }
10313  if (preg_match('/\.svg$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10314  $mime = 'image/svg+xml';
10315  $imgmime = 'image.png';
10316  $famime = 'file-image-o';
10317  }
10318  if (preg_match('/\.webp$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10319  $mime = 'image/webp';
10320  $imgmime = 'image.png';
10321  $famime = 'file-image-o';
10322  }
10323  // Calendar
10324  if (preg_match('/\.vcs$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10325  $mime = 'text/calendar';
10326  $imgmime = 'other.png';
10327  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10328  }
10329  if (preg_match('/\.ics$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10330  $mime = 'text/calendar';
10331  $imgmime = 'other.png';
10332  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10333  }
10334  // Other
10335  if (preg_match('/\.torrent$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10336  $mime = 'application/x-bittorrent';
10337  $imgmime = 'other.png';
10338  $famime = 'file-o';
10339  }
10340  // Audio
10341  if (preg_match('/\.(mp3|ogg|au|wav|wma|mid)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10342  $mime = 'audio';
10343  $imgmime = 'audio.png';
10344  $famime = 'file-audio-o';
10345  }
10346  // Video
10347  if (preg_match('/\.mp4$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10348  $mime = 'video/mp4';
10349  $imgmime = 'video.png';
10350  $famime = 'file-video-o';
10351  }
10352  if (preg_match('/\.ogv$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10353  $mime = 'video/ogg';
10354  $imgmime = 'video.png';
10355  $famime = 'file-video-o';
10356  }
10357  if (preg_match('/\.webm$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10358  $mime = 'video/webm';
10359  $imgmime = 'video.png';
10360  $famime = 'file-video-o';
10361  }
10362  if (preg_match('/\.avi$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10363  $mime = 'video/x-msvideo';
10364  $imgmime = 'video.png';
10365  $famime = 'file-video-o';
10366  }
10367  if (preg_match('/\.divx$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10368  $mime = 'video/divx';
10369  $imgmime = 'video.png';
10370  $famime = 'file-video-o';
10371  }
10372  if (preg_match('/\.xvid$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10373  $mime = 'video/xvid';
10374  $imgmime = 'video.png';
10375  $famime = 'file-video-o';
10376  }
10377  if (preg_match('/\.(wmv|mpg|mpeg)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10378  $mime = 'video';
10379  $imgmime = 'video.png';
10380  $famime = 'file-video-o';
10381  }
10382  // Archive
10383  if (preg_match('/\.(zip|rar|gz|tgz|z|cab|bz2|7z|tar|lzh|zst)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10384  $mime = 'archive';
10385  $imgmime = 'archive.png';
10386  $famime = 'file-archive-o';
10387  } // application/xxx where zzz is zip, ...
10388  // Exe
10389  if (preg_match('/\.(exe|com)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10390  $mime = 'application/octet-stream';
10391  $imgmime = 'other.png';
10392  $famime = 'file-o';
10393  }
10394  // Lib
10395  if (preg_match('/\.(dll|lib|o|so|a)$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10396  $mime = 'library';
10397  $imgmime = 'library.png';
10398  $famime = 'file-o';
10399  }
10400  // Err
10401  if (preg_match('/\.err$/i', $tmpfile)) {
10402  $mime = 'error';
10403  $imgmime = 'error.png';
10404  $famime = 'file-text-o';
10405  }
10406 
10407  // Return string
10408  if ($mode == 1) {
10409  $tmp = explode('/', $mime);
10410  return (!empty($tmp[1]) ? $tmp[1] : $tmp[0]);
10411  }
10412  if ($mode == 2) {
10413  return $imgmime;
10414  }
10415  if ($mode == 3) {
10416  return $srclang;
10417  }
10418  if ($mode == 4) {
10419  return $famime;
10420  }
10421  return $mime;
10422 }
10423 
10435 function getDictionaryValue($tablename, $field, $id, $checkentity = false, $rowidfield = 'rowid')
10436 {
10437  global $conf, $db;
10438 
10439  $tablename = preg_replace('/^'.preg_quote(MAIN_DB_PREFIX, '/').'/', '', $tablename); // Clean name of table for backward compatibility.
10440 
10441  $dictvalues = (isset($conf->cache['dictvalues_'.$tablename]) ? $conf->cache['dictvalues_'.$tablename] : null);
10442 
10443  if (is_null($dictvalues)) {
10444  $dictvalues = array();
10445 
10446  $sql = "SELECT * FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$tablename." WHERE 1 = 1"; // Here select * is allowed as it is generic code and we don't have list of fields
10447  if ($checkentity) {
10448  $sql .= ' AND entity IN (0,'.getEntity($tablename).')';
10449  }
10450 
10451  $resql = $db->query($sql);
10452  if ($resql) {
10453  while ($obj = $db->fetch_object($resql)) {
10454  $dictvalues[$obj->{$rowidfield}] = $obj; // $obj is stdClass
10455  }
10456  } else {
10457  dol_print_error($db);
10458  }
10459 
10460  $conf->cache['dictvalues_'.$tablename] = $dictvalues;
10461  }
10462 
10463  if (!empty($dictvalues[$id])) {
10464  // Found
10465  $tmp = $dictvalues[$id];
10466  return (property_exists($tmp, $field) ? $tmp->$field : '');
10467  } else {
10468  // Not found
10469  return '';
10470  }
10471 }
10472 
10479 function colorIsLight($stringcolor)
10480 {
10481  $stringcolor = str_replace('#', '', $stringcolor);
10482  $res = -1;
10483  if (!empty($stringcolor)) {
10484  $res = 0;
10485  $tmp = explode(',', $stringcolor);
10486  if (count($tmp) > 1) { // This is a comma RGB ('255','255','255')
10487  $r = $tmp[0];
10488  $g = $tmp[1];
10489  $b = $tmp[2];
10490  } else {
10491  $hexr = $stringcolor[0].$stringcolor[1];
10492  $hexg = $stringcolor[2].$stringcolor[3];
10493  $hexb = $stringcolor[4].$stringcolor[5];
10494  $r = hexdec($hexr);
10495  $g = hexdec($hexg);
10496  $b = hexdec($hexb);
10497  }
10498  $bright = (max($r, $g, $b) + min($r, $g, $b)) / 510.0; // HSL algorithm
10499  if ($bright > 0.6) {
10500  $res = 1;
10501  }
10502  }
10503  return $res;
10504 }
10505 
10514 function isVisibleToUserType($type_user, &$menuentry, &$listofmodulesforexternal)
10515 {
10516  global $conf;
10517 
10518  //print 'type_user='.$type_user.' module='.$menuentry['module'].' enabled='.$menuentry['enabled'].' perms='.$menuentry['perms'];
10519  //print 'ok='.in_array($menuentry['module'], $listofmodulesforexternal);
10520  if (empty($menuentry['enabled'])) {
10521  return 0; // Entry disabled by condition
10522  }
10523  if ($type_user && $menuentry['module']) {
10524  $tmploops = explode('|', $menuentry['module']);
10525  $found = 0;
10526  foreach ($tmploops as $tmploop) {
10527  if (in_array($tmploop, $listofmodulesforexternal)) {
10528  $found++;
10529  break;
10530  }
10531  }
10532  if (!$found) {
10533  return 0; // Entry is for menus all excluded to external users
10534  }
10535  }
10536  if (!$menuentry['perms'] && $type_user) {
10537  return 0; // No permissions and user is external
10538  }
10539  if (!$menuentry['perms'] && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_MENU_HIDE_UNAUTHORIZED)) {
10540  return 0; // No permissions and option to hide when not allowed, even for internal user, is on
10541  }
10542  if (!$menuentry['perms']) {
10543  return 2; // No permissions and user is external
10544  }
10545  return 1;
10546 }
10547 
10555 function roundUpToNextMultiple($n, $x = 5)
10556 {
10557  return (ceil($n) % $x === 0) ? ceil($n) : round(($n + $x / 2) / $x) * $x;
10558 }
10559 
10571 function dolGetBadge($label, $html = '', $type = 'primary', $mode = '', $url = '', $params = array())
10572 {
10573  $attr = array(
10574  'class'=>'badge '.(!empty($mode) ? ' badge-'.$mode : '').(!empty($type) ? ' badge-'.$type : '').(empty($params['css']) ? '' : ' '.$params['css'])
10575  );
10576 
10577  if (empty($html)) {
10578  $html = $label;
10579  }
10580 
10581  if (!empty($url)) {
10582  $attr['href'] = $url;
10583  }
10584 
10585  if ($mode === 'dot') {
10586  $attr['class'] .= ' classfortooltip';
10587  $attr['title'] = $html;
10588  $attr['aria-label'] = $label;
10589  $html = '';
10590  }
10591 
10592  // Override attr
10593  if (!empty($params['attr']) && is_array($params['attr'])) {
10594  foreach ($params['attr'] as $key => $value) {
10595  if ($key == 'class') {
10596  $attr['class'] .= ' '.$value;
10597  } elseif ($key == 'classOverride') {
10598  $attr['class'] = $value;
10599  } else {
10600  $attr[$key] = $value;
10601  }
10602  }
10603  }
10604 
10605  // TODO: add hook
10606 
10607  // escape all attribute
10608  $attr = array_map('dol_escape_htmltag', $attr);
10609 
10610  $TCompiledAttr = array();
10611  foreach ($attr as $key => $value) {
10612  $TCompiledAttr[] = $key.'="'.$value.'"';
10613  }
10614 
10615  $compiledAttributes = !empty($TCompiledAttr) ?implode(' ', $TCompiledAttr) : '';
10616 
10617  $tag = !empty($url) ? 'a' : 'span';
10618 
10619  return '<'.$tag.' '.$compiledAttributes.'>'.$html.'</'.$tag.'>';
10620 }
10621 
10622 
10635 function dolGetStatus($statusLabel = '', $statusLabelShort = '', $html = '', $statusType = 'status0', $displayMode = 0, $url = '', $params = array())
10636 {
10637  global $conf;
10638 
10639  $return = '';
10640  $dolGetBadgeParams = array();
10641 
10642  if (!empty($params['badgeParams'])) {
10643  $dolGetBadgeParams = $params['badgeParams'];
10644  }
10645 
10646  // TODO : add a hook
10647  if ($displayMode == 0) {
10648  $return = !empty($html) ? $html : (empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen) ? $statusLabel : (empty($statusLabelShort) ? $statusLabel : $statusLabelShort));
10649  } elseif ($displayMode == 1) {
10650  $return = !empty($html) ? $html : (empty($statusLabelShort) ? $statusLabel : $statusLabelShort);
10651  } elseif (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_STATUS_USES_IMAGES)) {
10652  // Use status with images (for backward compatibility)
10653  $return = '';
10654  $htmlLabel = (in_array($displayMode, array(1, 2, 5)) ? '<span class="hideonsmartphone">' : '').(!empty($html) ? $html : $statusLabel).(in_array($displayMode, array(1, 2, 5)) ? '</span>' : '');
10655  $htmlLabelShort = (in_array($displayMode, array(1, 2, 5)) ? '<span class="hideonsmartphone">' : '').(!empty($html) ? $html : (!empty($statusLabelShort) ? $statusLabelShort : $statusLabel)).(in_array($displayMode, array(1, 2, 5)) ? '</span>' : '');
10656 
10657  // For small screen, we always use the short label instead of long label.
10658  if (!empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen)) {
10659  if ($displayMode == 0) {
10660  $displayMode = 1;
10661  } elseif ($displayMode == 4) {
10662  $displayMode = 2;
10663  } elseif ($displayMode == 6) {
10664  $displayMode = 5;
10665  }
10666  }
10667 
10668  // For backward compatibility. Image's filename are still in French, so we use this array to convert
10669  $statusImg = array(
10670  'status0' => 'statut0',
10671  'status1' => 'statut1',
10672  'status2' => 'statut2',
10673  'status3' => 'statut3',
10674  'status4' => 'statut4',
10675  'status5' => 'statut5',
10676  'status6' => 'statut6',
10677  'status7' => 'statut7',
10678  'status8' => 'statut8',
10679  'status9' => 'statut9'
10680  );
10681 
10682  if (!empty($statusImg[$statusType])) {
10683  $htmlImg = img_picto($statusLabel, $statusImg[$statusType]);
10684  } else {
10685  $htmlImg = img_picto($statusLabel, $statusType);
10686  }
10687 
10688  if ($displayMode === 2) {
10689  $return = $htmlImg.' '.$htmlLabelShort;
10690  } elseif ($displayMode === 3) {
10691  $return = $htmlImg;
10692  } elseif ($displayMode === 4) {
10693  $return = $htmlImg.' '.$htmlLabel;
10694  } elseif ($displayMode === 5) {
10695  $return = $htmlLabelShort.' '.$htmlImg;
10696  } else { // $displayMode >= 6
10697  $return = $htmlLabel.' '.$htmlImg;
10698  }
10699  } elseif (empty($conf->global->MAIN_STATUS_USES_IMAGES) && !empty($displayMode)) {
10700  // Use new badge
10701  $statusLabelShort = (empty($statusLabelShort) ? $statusLabel : $statusLabelShort);
10702 
10703  $dolGetBadgeParams['attr']['class'] = 'badge-status';
10704  $dolGetBadgeParams['attr']['title'] = empty($params['tooltip']) ? $statusLabel : ($params['tooltip'] != 'no' ? $params['tooltip'] : '');
10705 
10706  if ($displayMode == 3) {
10707  $return = dolGetBadge((empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen) ? $statusLabel : (empty($statusLabelShort) ? $statusLabel : $statusLabelShort)), '', $statusType, 'dot', $url, $dolGetBadgeParams);
10708  } elseif ($displayMode === 5) {
10709  $return = dolGetBadge($statusLabelShort, $html, $statusType, '', $url, $dolGetBadgeParams);
10710  } else {
10711  $return = dolGetBadge((empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen) ? $statusLabel : (empty($statusLabelShort) ? $statusLabel : $statusLabelShort)), $html, $statusType, '', $url, $dolGetBadgeParams);
10712  }
10713  }
10714 
10715  return $return;
10716 }
10717 
10718 
10748 function dolGetButtonAction($label, $text = '', $actionType = 'default', $url = '', $id = '', $userRight = 1, $params = array())
10749 {
10750  global $hookmanager, $action, $object, $langs;
10751 
10752  //var_dump($params);
10753  if (!empty($params['isDropdown']))
10754  $class = "dropdown-item";
10755  else {
10756  $class = 'butAction';
10757  if ($actionType == 'danger' || $actionType == 'delete') {
10758  $class = 'butActionDelete';
10759  if (!empty($url) && strpos($url, 'token=') === false) $url .= '&token='.newToken();
10760  }
10761  }
10762  $attr = array(
10763  'class' => $class,
10764  'href' => empty($url) ? '' : $url,
10765  'title' => $label
10766  );
10767 
10768  if (empty($text)) {
10769  $text = $label;
10770  $attr['title'] = ''; // if html not set, leave label on title is redundant
10771  } else {
10772  $attr['title'] = $label;
10773  $attr['aria-label'] = $label;
10774  }
10775 
10776  if (empty($userRight)) {
10777  $attr['class'] = 'butActionRefused';
10778  $attr['href'] = '';
10779  $attr['title'] = (($label && $text && $label != $text) ? $label : $langs->trans('NotEnoughPermissions'));
10780  }
10781 
10782  if (!empty($id)) {
10783  $attr['id'] = $id;
10784  }
10785 
10786  // Override attr
10787  if (!empty($params['attr']) && is_array($params['attr'])) {
10788  foreach ($params['attr'] as $key => $value) {
10789  if ($key == 'class') {
10790  $attr['class'] .= ' '.$value;
10791  } elseif ($key == 'classOverride') {
10792  $attr['class'] = $value;
10793  } else {
10794  $attr[$key] = $value;
10795  }
10796  }
10797  }
10798 
10799  // automatic add tooltip when title is detected
10800  if (!empty($attr['title']) && !empty($attr['class']) && strpos($attr['class'], 'classfortooltip') === false) {
10801  $attr['class'].= ' classfortooltip';
10802  }
10803 
10804  // Js Confirm button
10805  if ($userRight && !empty($params['confirm'])) {
10806  if (!is_array($params['confirm'])) {
10807  $params['confirm'] = array();
10808  }
10809 
10810  if (empty($params['confirm']['url'])) {
10811  $params['confirm']['url'] = $url . (strpos($url, '?') > 0 ? '&' : '?') . 'confirm=yes';
10812  }
10813 
10814  // for js desabled compatibility set $url as call to confirm action and $params['confirm']['url'] to confirmed action
10815  $attr['data-confirm-url'] = $params['confirm']['url'];
10816  $attr['data-confirm-title'] = !empty($params['confirm']['title']) ? $params['confirm']['title'] : $langs->trans('ConfirmBtnCommonTitle', $label);
10817  $attr['data-confirm-content'] = !empty($params['confirm']['content']) ? $params['confirm']['content'] : $langs->trans('ConfirmBtnCommonContent', $label);
10818  $attr['data-confirm-content'] = preg_replace("/\r|\n/", "", $attr['data-confirm-content']);
10819  $attr['data-confirm-action-btn-label'] = !empty($params['confirm']['action-btn-label']) ? $params['confirm']['action-btn-label'] : $langs->trans('Confirm');
10820  $attr['data-confirm-cancel-btn-label'] = !empty($params['confirm']['cancel-btn-label']) ? $params['confirm']['cancel-btn-label'] : $langs->trans('CloseDialog');
10821  $attr['data-confirm-modal'] = !empty($params['confirm']['modal']) ? $params['confirm']['modal'] : true;
10822 
10823  $attr['class'].= ' butActionConfirm';
10824  }
10825 
10826  if (isset($attr['href']) && empty($attr['href'])) {
10827  unset($attr['href']);
10828  }
10829 
10830  // escape all attribute
10831  $attr = array_map('dol_escape_htmltag', $attr);
10832 
10833  $TCompiledAttr = array();
10834  foreach ($attr as $key => $value) {
10835  $TCompiledAttr[] = $key.'= "'.$value.'"';
10836  }
10837 
10838  $compiledAttributes = empty($TCompiledAttr) ? '' : implode(' ', $TCompiledAttr);
10839 
10840  $tag = !empty($attr['href']) ? 'a' : 'span';
10841 
10842 
10843  $parameters = array(
10844  'TCompiledAttr' => $TCompiledAttr, // array
10845  'compiledAttributes' => $compiledAttributes, // string
10846  'attr' => $attr,
10847  'tag' => $tag,
10848  'label' => $label,
10849  'html' => $text,
10850  'actionType' => $actionType,
10851  'url' => $url,
10852  'id' => $id,
10853  'userRight' => $userRight,
10854  'params' => $params
10855  );
10856 
10857  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('dolGetButtonAction', $parameters, $object, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
10858  if ($reshook < 0) setEventMessages($hookmanager->error, $hookmanager->errors, 'errors');
10859 
10860  if (empty($reshook)) {
10861  if (dol_textishtml($text)) { // If content already HTML encoded
10862  return '<' . $tag . ' ' . $compiledAttributes . '>' . $text . '</' . $tag . '>';
10863  } else {
10864  return '<' . $tag . ' ' . $compiledAttributes . '>' . dol_escape_htmltag($text) . '</' . $tag . '>';
10865  }
10866  } else {
10867  return $hookmanager->resPrint;
10868  }
10869 }
10870 
10877 function dolGetButtonTitleSeparator($moreClass = "")
10878 {
10879  return '<span class="button-title-separator '.$moreClass.'" ></span>';
10880 }
10881 
10888 function getFieldErrorIcon($fieldValidationErrorMsg)
10889 {
10890  $out = '';
10891  if (!empty($fieldValidationErrorMsg)) {
10892  $out.= '<span class="field-error-icon classfortooltip" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($fieldValidationErrorMsg, 1).'" role="alert" >'; // role alert is used for accessibility
10893  $out.= '<span class="fa fa-exclamation-circle" aria-hidden="true" ></span>'; // For accessibility icon is separated and aria-hidden
10894  $out.= '</span>';
10895  }
10896 
10897  return $out;
10898 }
10899 
10912 function dolGetButtonTitle($label, $helpText = '', $iconClass = 'fa fa-file', $url = '', $id = '', $status = 1, $params = array())
10913 {
10914  global $langs, $conf, $user;
10915 
10916  // Actually this conf is used in css too for external module compatibility and smooth transition to this function
10917  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_BUTTON_HIDE_UNAUTHORIZED) && (!$user->admin) && $status <= 0) {
10918  return '';
10919  }
10920 
10921  $class = 'btnTitle';
10922  if (in_array($iconClass, array('fa fa-plus-circle', 'fa fa-plus-circle size15x', 'fa fa-comment-dots', 'fa fa-paper-plane'))) {
10923  $class .= ' btnTitlePlus';
10924  }
10925  $useclassfortooltip = 1;
10926 
10927  if (!empty($params['morecss'])) {
10928  $class .= ' '.$params['morecss'];
10929  }
10930 
10931  $attr = array(
10932  'class' => $class,
10933  'href' => empty($url) ? '' : $url
10934  );
10935 
10936  if (!empty($helpText)) {
10937  $attr['title'] = dol_escape_htmltag($helpText);
10938  } elseif (empty($attr['title']) && $label) {
10939  $attr['title'] = $label;
10940  $useclassfortooltip = 0;
10941  }
10942 
10943  if ($status == 2) {
10944  $attr['class'] .= ' btnTitleSelected';
10945  } elseif ($status <= 0) {
10946  $attr['class'] .= ' refused';
10947 
10948  $attr['href'] = '';
10949 
10950  if ($status == -1) { // disable
10951  $attr['title'] = dol_escape_htmltag($langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("FeatureDisabled"));
10952  } elseif ($status == 0) { // Not enough permissions
10953  $attr['title'] = dol_escape_htmltag($langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("NotEnoughPermissions"));
10954  }
10955  }
10956 
10957  if (!empty($attr['title']) && $useclassfortooltip) {
10958  $attr['class'] .= ' classfortooltip';
10959  }
10960 
10961  if (!empty($id)) {
10962  $attr['id'] = $id;
10963  }
10964 
10965  // Override attr
10966  if (!empty($params['attr']) && is_array($params['attr'])) {
10967  foreach ($params['attr'] as $key => $value) {
10968  if ($key == 'class') {
10969  $attr['class'] .= ' '.$value;
10970  } elseif ($key == 'classOverride') {
10971  $attr['class'] = $value;
10972  } else {
10973  $attr[$key] = $value;
10974  }
10975  }
10976  }
10977 
10978  if (isset($attr['href']) && empty($attr['href'])) {
10979  unset($attr['href']);
10980  }
10981 
10982  // TODO : add a hook
10983 
10984  // escape all attribute
10985  $attr = array_map('dol_escape_htmltag', $attr);
10986 
10987  $TCompiledAttr = array();
10988  foreach ($attr as $key => $value) {
10989  $TCompiledAttr[] = $key.'="'.$value.'"';
10990  }
10991 
10992  $compiledAttributes = (empty($TCompiledAttr) ? '' : implode(' ', $TCompiledAttr));
10993 
10994  $tag = (empty($attr['href']) ? 'span' : 'a');
10995 
10996  $button = '<'.$tag.' '.$compiledAttributes.'>';
10997  $button .= '<span class="'.$iconClass.' valignmiddle btnTitle-icon"></span>';
10998  if (!empty($params['forcenohideoftext'])) {
10999  $button .= '<span class="valignmiddle text-plus-circle btnTitle-label'.(empty($params['forcenohideoftext']) ? ' hideonsmartphone' : '').'">'.$label.'</span>';
11000  }
11001  $button .= '</'.$tag.'>';
11002 
11003  return $button;
11004 }
11005 
11013 function getElementProperties($element_type)
11014 {
11015  $regs = array();
11016 
11017  $classfile = $classname = $classpath = '';
11018 
11019  // Parse element/subelement (ex: project_task)
11020  $module = $element_type;
11021  $element = $element_type;
11022  $subelement = $element_type;
11023 
11024  // If we ask an resource form external module (instead of default path)
11025  if (preg_match('/^([^@]+)@([^@]+)$/i', $element_type, $regs)) {
11026  $element = $subelement = $regs[1];
11027  $module = $regs[2];
11028  }
11029 
11030  //print '<br>1. element : '.$element.' - module : '.$module .'<br>';
11031  if (preg_match('/^([^_]+)_([^_]+)/i', $element, $regs)) {
11032  $module = $element = $regs[1];
11033  $subelement = $regs[2];
11034  }
11035 
11036  // For compat
11037  if ($element_type == "action") {
11038  $classpath = 'comm/action/class';
11039  $subelement = 'Actioncomm';
11040  $module = 'agenda';
11041  }
11042 
11043  // To work with non standard path
11044  if ($element_type == 'facture' || $element_type == 'invoice') {
11045  $classpath = 'compta/facture/class';
11046  $module = 'facture';
11047  $subelement = 'facture';
11048  }
11049  if ($element_type == 'commande' || $element_type == 'order') {
11050  $classpath = 'commande/class';
11051  $module = 'commande';
11052  $subelement = 'commande';
11053  }
11054  if ($element_type == 'propal') {
11055  $classpath = 'comm/propal/class';
11056  }
11057  if ($element_type == 'supplier_proposal') {
11058  $classpath = 'supplier_proposal/class';
11059  }
11060  if ($element_type == 'shipping') {
11061  $classpath = 'expedition/class';
11062  $subelement = 'expedition';
11063  $module = 'expedition_bon';
11064  }
11065  if ($element_type == 'delivery') {
11066  $classpath = 'delivery/class';
11067  $subelement = 'delivery';
11068  $module = 'delivery_note';
11069  }
11070  if ($element_type == 'contract') {
11071  $classpath = 'contrat/class';
11072  $module = 'contrat';
11073  $subelement = 'contrat';
11074  }
11075  if ($element_type == 'member') {
11076  $classpath = 'adherents/class';
11077  $module = 'adherent';
11078  $subelement = 'adherent';
11079  }
11080  if ($element_type == 'cabinetmed_cons') {
11081  $classpath = 'cabinetmed/class';
11082  $module = 'cabinetmed';
11083  $subelement = 'cabinetmedcons';
11084  }
11085  if ($element_type == 'fichinter') {
11086  $classpath = 'fichinter/class';
11087  $module = 'ficheinter';
11088  $subelement = 'fichinter';
11089  }
11090  if ($element_type == 'dolresource' || $element_type == 'resource') {
11091  $classpath = 'resource/class';
11092  $module = 'resource';
11093  $subelement = 'dolresource';
11094  }
11095  if ($element_type == 'propaldet') {
11096  $classpath = 'comm/propal/class';
11097  $module = 'propal';
11098  $subelement = 'propaleligne';
11099  }
11100  if ($element_type == 'order_supplier') {
11101  $classpath = 'fourn/class';
11102  $module = 'fournisseur';
11103  $subelement = 'commandefournisseur';
11104  $classfile = 'fournisseur.commande';
11105  }
11106  if ($element_type == 'invoice_supplier') {
11107  $classpath = 'fourn/class';
11108  $module = 'fournisseur';
11109  $subelement = 'facturefournisseur';
11110  $classfile = 'fournisseur.facture';
11111  }
11112  if ($element_type == "service") {
11113  $classpath = 'product/class';
11114  $subelement = 'product';
11115  }
11116 
11117  if (empty($classfile)) {
11118  $classfile = strtolower($subelement);
11119  }
11120  if (empty($classname)) {
11121  $classname = ucfirst($subelement);
11122  }
11123  if (empty($classpath)) {
11124  $classpath = $module.'/class';
11125  }
11126 
11127  $element_properties = array(
11128  'module' => $module,
11129  'classpath' => $classpath,
11130  'element' => $element,
11131  'subelement' => $subelement,
11132  'classfile' => $classfile,
11133  'classname' => $classname
11134  );
11135  return $element_properties;
11136 }
11137 
11147 function fetchObjectByElement($element_id, $element_type, $element_ref = '')
11148 {
11149  global $conf, $db;
11150 
11151  $element_prop = getElementProperties($element_type);
11152  if (is_array($element_prop) && $conf->{$element_prop['module']}->enabled) {
11153  dol_include_once('/'.$element_prop['classpath'].'/'.$element_prop['classfile'].'.class.php');
11154 
11155  $objecttmp = new $element_prop['classname']($db);
11156  $ret = $objecttmp->fetch($element_id, $element_ref);
11157  if ($ret >= 0) {
11158  return $objecttmp;
11159  }
11160  }
11161  return 0;
11162 }
11163 
11170 function isAFileWithExecutableContent($filename)
11171 {
11172  if (preg_match('/\.(htm|html|js|phar|php|php\d+|phtml|pht|pl|py|cgi|ksh|sh|shtml|bash|bat|cmd|wpk|exe|dmg)$/i', $filename)) {
11173  return true;
11174  }
11175 
11176  return false;
11177 }
11178 
11185 function newToken()
11186 {
11187  return empty($_SESSION['newtoken']) ? '' : $_SESSION['newtoken'];
11188 }
11189 
11196 function currentToken()
11197 {
11198  return isset($_SESSION['token']) ? $_SESSION['token'] : '';
11199 }
11200 
11213 function startSimpleTable($header, $link = "", $arguments = "", $emptyRows = 0, $number = -1)
11214 {
11215  global $langs;
11216 
11217  print '<div class="div-table-responsive-no-min">';
11218  print '<table class="noborder centpercent">';
11219  print '<tr class="liste_titre">';
11220 
11221  print $emptyRows < 1 ? '<th>' : '<th colspan="'.($emptyRows + 1).'">';
11222 
11223  print $langs->trans($header);
11224 
11225  // extra space between the first header and the number
11226  if ($number > -1) {
11227  print ' ';
11228  }
11229 
11230  if (!empty($link)) {
11231  if (!empty($arguments)) {
11232  print '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/'.$link.'?'.$arguments.'">';
11233  } else {
11234  print '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/'.$link.'">';
11235  }
11236  }
11237 
11238  if ($number > -1) {
11239  print '<span class="badge">'.$number.'</span>';
11240  }
11241 
11242  if (!empty($link)) {
11243  print '</a>';
11244  }
11245 
11246  print '</th>';
11247 
11248  if ($number < 0 && !empty($link)) {
11249  print '<th class="right">';
11250 
11251  if (!empty($arguments)) {
11252  print '<a class="commonlink" href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/'.$link.'?'.$arguments.'">';
11253  } else {
11254  print '<a class="commonlink" href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/'.$link.'">';
11255  }
11256 
11257  print $langs->trans("FullList");
11258  print '</a>';
11259  print '</th>';
11260  }
11261 
11262  print '</tr>';
11263 }
11264 
11273 function finishSimpleTable($addLineBreak = false)
11274 {
11275  print '</table>';
11276  print '</div>';
11277 
11278  if ($addLineBreak) {
11279  print '<br>';
11280  }
11281 }
11282 
11294 function addSummaryTableLine($tableColumnCount, $num, $nbofloop = 0, $total = 0, $noneWord = "None", $extraRightColumn = false)
11295 {
11296  global $langs;
11297 
11298  if ($num === 0) {
11299  print '<tr class="oddeven">';
11300  print '<td colspan="'.$tableColumnCount.'" class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans($noneWord).'</td>';
11301  print '</tr>';
11302  return;
11303  }
11304 
11305  if ($nbofloop === 0) {
11306  // don't show a summary line
11307  return;
11308  }
11309 
11310  if ($num === 0) {
11311  $colspan = $tableColumnCount;
11312  } elseif ($num > $nbofloop) {
11313  $colspan = $tableColumnCount;
11314  } else {
11315  $colspan = $tableColumnCount - 1;
11316  }
11317 
11318  if ($extraRightColumn) {
11319  $colspan--;
11320  }
11321 
11322  print '<tr class="liste_total">';
11323 
11324  if ($nbofloop > 0 && $num > $nbofloop) {
11325  print '<td colspan="'.$colspan.'" class="right">'.$langs->trans("XMoreLines", ($num - $nbofloop)).'</td>';
11326  } else {
11327  print '<td colspan="'.$colspan.'" class="right"> '.$langs->trans("Total").'</td>';
11328  print '<td class="right" width="100">'.price($total).'</td>';
11329  }
11330 
11331  if ($extraRightColumn) {
11332  print '<td></td>';
11333  }
11334 
11335  print '</tr>';
11336 }
11337 
11346 function readfileLowMemory($fullpath_original_file_osencoded, $method = -1)
11347 {
11348  global $conf;
11349 
11350  if ($method == -1) {
11351  $method = 0;
11352  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_FORCE_READFILE_WITH_FREAD)) {
11353  $method = 1;
11354  }
11355  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_FORCE_READFILE_WITH_STREAM_COPY)) {
11356  $method = 2;
11357  }
11358  }
11359 
11360  // Be sure we don't have output buffering enabled to have readfile working correctly
11361  while (ob_get_level()) {
11362  ob_end_flush();
11363  }
11364 
11365  // Solution 0
11366  if ($method == 0) {
11367  readfile($fullpath_original_file_osencoded);
11368  } elseif ($method == 1) {
11369  // Solution 1
11370  $handle = fopen($fullpath_original_file_osencoded, "rb");
11371  while (!feof($handle)) {
11372  print fread($handle, 8192);
11373  }
11374  fclose($handle);
11375  } elseif ($method == 2) {
11376  // Solution 2
11377  $handle1 = fopen($fullpath_original_file_osencoded, "rb");
11378  $handle2 = fopen("php://output", "wb");
11379  stream_copy_to_stream($handle1, $handle2);
11380  fclose($handle1);
11381  fclose($handle2);
11382  }
11383 }
11384 
11394 function showValueWithClipboardCPButton($valuetocopy, $showonlyonhover = 1, $texttoshow = '')
11395 {
11396  /*
11397  global $conf;
11398 
11399  if (!empty($conf->dol_no_mouse_hover)) {
11400  $showonlyonhover = 0;
11401  }*/
11402 
11403  $tag = 'span'; // Using div (like any style of type 'block') does not work when using the js copy code.
11404  if ($texttoshow === 'none') {
11405  $result = '<span class="clipboardCP'.($showonlyonhover ? ' clipboardCPShowOnHover' : '').'"><'.$tag.' class="clipboardCPValue hidewithsize">'.dol_escape_htmltag($valuetocopy, 1, 1).'</'.$tag.'><span class="clipboardCPValueToPrint"></span><span class="clipboardCPButton far fa-clipboard opacitymedium paddingleft paddingright"></span><span class="clipboardCPText"></span></span>';
11406  } elseif ($texttoshow) {
11407  $result = '<span class="clipboardCP'.($showonlyonhover ? ' clipboardCPShowOnHover' : '').'"><'.$tag.' class="clipboardCPValue hidewithsize">'.dol_escape_htmltag($valuetocopy, 1, 1).'</'.$tag.'><span class="clipboardCPValueToPrint">'.dol_escape_htmltag($texttoshow, 1, 1).'</span><span class="clipboardCPButton far fa-clipboard opacitymedium paddingleft paddingright"></span><span class="clipboardCPText"></span></span>';
11408  } else {
11409  $result = '<span class="clipboardCP'.($showonlyonhover ? ' clipboardCPShowOnHover' : '').'"><'.$tag.' class="clipboardCPValue">'.dol_escape_htmltag($valuetocopy, 1, 1).'</'.$tag.'><span class="clipboardCPButton far fa-clipboard opacitymedium paddingleft paddingright"></span><span class="clipboardCPText"></span></span>';
11410  }
11411 
11412  return $result;
11413 }
11414 
11415 
11422 function jsonOrUnserialize($stringtodecode)
11423 {
11424  $result = json_decode($stringtodecode);
11425  if ($result === null) {
11426  $result = unserialize($stringtodecode);
11427  }
11428 
11429  return $result;
11430 }
11431 
11432 
11448 function dolCheckFilters($sqlfilters, &$error = '')
11449 {
11450  //$regexstring='\‍(([^:\'\‍(\‍)]+:[^:\'\‍(\‍)]+:[^:\‍(\‍)]+)\‍)';
11451  //$tmp=preg_replace_all('/'.$regexstring.'/', '', $sqlfilters);
11452  $tmp = $sqlfilters;
11453  $i = 0; $nb = strlen($tmp);
11454  $counter = 0;
11455  while ($i < $nb) {
11456  if ($tmp[$i] == '(') {
11457  $counter++;
11458  }
11459  if ($tmp[$i] == ')') {
11460  $counter--;
11461  }
11462  if ($counter < 0) {
11463  $error = "Bad sqlfilters=".$sqlfilters;
11464  dol_syslog($error, LOG_WARNING);
11465  return false;
11466  }
11467  $i++;
11468  }
11469  return true;
11470 }
11471 
11487 function dolForgeCriteriaCallback($matches)
11488 {
11489  global $db;
11490 
11491  dol_syslog("Convert matches ".$matches[1]);
11492  if (empty($matches[1])) {
11493  return '';
11494  }
11495  $tmp = explode(':', $matches[1], 3);
11496 
11497  if (count($tmp) < 3) {
11498  return '';
11499  }
11500 
11501  $operand = preg_replace('/[^a-z0-9\._]/i', '', trim($tmp[0]));
11502 
11503  $operator = strtoupper(preg_replace('/[^a-z<>=]/i', '', trim($tmp[1])));
11504  if ($operator == 'NOTLIKE') {
11505  $operator = 'NOT LIKE';
11506  }
11507 
11508  $tmpescaped = trim($tmp[2]);
11509  $regbis = array();
11510  if ($operator == 'IN') {
11511  $tmpescaped = "(".$db->sanitize($tmpescaped, 1).")";
11512  } elseif (preg_match('/^\'(.*)\'$/', $tmpescaped, $regbis)) {
11513  $tmpescaped = "'".$db->escape($regbis[1])."'";
11514  } else {
11515  $tmpescaped = $db->sanitize($db->escape($tmpescaped));
11516  }
11517 
11518  return $db->escape($operand).' '.$db->escape($operator)." ".$tmpescaped;
11519 }
11520 
11521 
11522 
11530 function getTimelineIcon($actionstatic, &$histo, $key)
11531 {
11532  global $conf, $langs;
11533  $out = '<!-- timeline icon -->'."\n";
11534  $iconClass = 'fa fa-comments';
11535  $img_picto = '';
11536  $colorClass = '';
11537  $pictoTitle = '';
11538 
11539  if ($histo[$key]['percent'] == -1) {
11540  $colorClass = 'timeline-icon-not-applicble';
11541  $pictoTitle = $langs->trans('StatusNotApplicable');
11542  } elseif ($histo[$key]['percent'] == 0) {
11543  $colorClass = 'timeline-icon-todo';
11544  $pictoTitle = $langs->trans('StatusActionToDo').' (0%)';
11545  } elseif ($histo[$key]['percent'] > 0 && $histo[$key]['percent'] < 100) {
11546  $colorClass = 'timeline-icon-in-progress';
11547  $pictoTitle = $langs->trans('StatusActionInProcess').' ('.$histo[$key]['percent'].'%)';
11548  } elseif ($histo[$key]['percent'] >= 100) {
11549  $colorClass = 'timeline-icon-done';
11550  $pictoTitle = $langs->trans('StatusActionDone').' (100%)';
11551  }
11552 
11553  if ($actionstatic->code == 'AC_TICKET_CREATE') {
11554  $iconClass = 'fa fa-ticket';
11555  } elseif ($actionstatic->code == 'AC_TICKET_MODIFY') {
11556  $iconClass = 'fa fa-pencilxxx';
11557  } elseif (preg_match('/^TICKET_MSG/', $actionstatic->code)) {
11558  $iconClass = 'fa fa-comments';
11559  } elseif (preg_match('/^TICKET_MSG_PRIVATE/', $actionstatic->code)) {
11560  $iconClass = 'fa fa-mask';
11561  } elseif (!empty($conf->global->AGENDA_USE_EVENT_TYPE)) {
11562  if ($actionstatic->type_picto) {
11563  $img_picto = img_picto('', $actionstatic->type_picto);
11564  } else {
11565  if ($actionstatic->type_code == 'AC_RDV') {
11566  $iconClass = 'fa fa-handshake';
11567  } elseif ($actionstatic->type_code == 'AC_TEL') {
11568  $iconClass = 'fa fa-phone';
11569  } elseif ($actionstatic->type_code == 'AC_FAX') {
11570  $iconClass = 'fa fa-fax';
11571  } elseif ($actionstatic->type_code == 'AC_EMAIL') {
11572  $iconClass = 'fa fa-envelope';
11573  } elseif ($actionstatic->type_code == 'AC_INT') {
11574  $iconClass = 'fa fa-shipping-fast';
11575  } elseif ($actionstatic->type_code == 'AC_OTH_AUTO') {
11576  $iconClass = 'fa fa-robot';
11577  } elseif (!preg_match('/_AUTO/', $actionstatic->type_code)) {
11578  $iconClass = 'fa fa-robot';
11579  }
11580  }
11581  }
11582 
11583  $out .= '<i class="'.$iconClass.' '.$colorClass.'" title="'.$pictoTitle.'">'.$img_picto.'</i>'."\n";
11584  return $out;
11585 }
11586 
11593 function getActionCommEcmList($object)
11594 {
11595  global $conf, $db;
11596 
11597  $documents = array();
11598 
11599  $sql = 'SELECT ecm.rowid as id, ecm.src_object_type, ecm.src_object_id, ecm.filepath, ecm.filename';
11600  $sql .= ' FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'ecm_files ecm';
11601  $sql .= " WHERE ecm.filepath = 'agenda/".((int) $object->id)."'";
11602  //$sql.= " ecm.src_object_type = '".$db->escape($object->element)."' AND ecm.src_object_id = ".((int) $object->id); // Old version didn't add object_type during upload
11603  $sql .= ' ORDER BY ecm.position ASC';
11604 
11605  $resql = $db->query($sql);
11606  if ($resql) {
11607  if ($db->num_rows($resql)) {
11608  while ($obj = $db->fetch_object($resql)) {
11609  $documents[$obj->id] = $obj;
11610  }
11611  }
11612  }
11613 
11614  return $documents;
11615 }
11616 
11617 
11618 
11636 function show_actions_messaging($conf, $langs, $db, $filterobj, $objcon = '', $noprint = 0, $actioncode = '', $donetodo = 'done', $filters = array(), $sortfield = 'a.datep,a.id', $sortorder = 'DESC')
11637 {
11638  global $user, $conf;
11639  global $form;
11640 
11641  global $param, $massactionbutton;
11642 
11643  dol_include_once('/comm/action/class/actioncomm.class.php');
11644 
11645  // Check parameters
11646  if (!is_object($filterobj) && !is_object($objcon)) {
11647  dol_print_error('', 'BadParameter');
11648  }
11649 
11650  $histo = array();
11651  $numaction = 0;
11652  $now = dol_now();
11653 
11654  $sortfield_list = explode(',', $sortfield);
11655  $sortfield_label_list = array('a.id' => 'id', 'a.datep' => 'dp', 'a.percent' => 'percent');
11656  $sortfield_new_list = array();
11657  foreach ($sortfield_list as $sortfield_value) {
11658  $sortfield_new_list[] = $sortfield_label_list[trim($sortfield_value)];
11659  }
11660  $sortfield_new = implode(',', $sortfield_new_list);
11661 
11662  if (isModEnabled('agenda')) {
11663  // Search histo on actioncomm
11664  if (is_object($objcon) && $objcon->id > 0) {
11665  $sql = "SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.label as label,";
11666  } else {
11667  $sql = "SELECT a.id, a.label as label,";
11668  }
11669  $sql .= " a.datep as dp,";
11670  $sql .= " a.note as message,";
11671  $sql .= " a.datep2 as dp2,";
11672  $sql .= " a.percent as percent, 'action' as type,";
11673  $sql .= " a.fk_element, a.elementtype,";
11674  $sql .= " a.fk_contact,";
11675  $sql .= " c.code as acode, c.libelle as alabel, c.picto as apicto,";
11676  $sql .= " u.rowid as user_id, u.login as user_login, u.photo as user_photo, u.firstname as user_firstname, u.lastname as user_lastname";
11677  if (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Societe') {
11678  $sql .= ", sp.lastname, sp.firstname";
11679  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Adherent') {
11680  $sql .= ", m.lastname, m.firstname";
11681  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'CommandeFournisseur') {
11682  $sql .= ", o.ref";
11683  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Product') {
11684  $sql .= ", o.ref";
11685  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Ticket') {
11686  $sql .= ", o.ref";
11687  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'BOM') {
11688  $sql .= ", o.ref";
11689  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Contrat') {
11690  $sql .= ", o.ref";
11691  }
11692  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."actioncomm as a";
11693  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."user as u on u.rowid = a.fk_user_action";
11694  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_actioncomm as c ON a.fk_action = c.id";
11695 
11696  $force_filter_contact = false;
11697  if (is_object($objcon) && $objcon->id > 0) {
11698  $force_filter_contact = true;
11699  $sql .= " INNER JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."actioncomm_resources as r ON a.id = r.fk_actioncomm";
11700  $sql .= " AND r.element_type = '".$db->escape($objcon->table_element)."' AND r.fk_element = ".((int) $objcon->id);
11701  }
11702 
11703  if (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Societe') {
11704  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."socpeople as sp ON a.fk_contact = sp.rowid";
11705  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Dolresource') {
11706  $sql .= " INNER JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."element_resources as er";
11707  $sql .= " ON er.resource_type = 'dolresource'";
11708  $sql .= " AND er.element_id = a.id";
11709  $sql .= " AND er.resource_id = ".((int) $filterobj->id);
11710  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Adherent') {
11711  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."adherent as m";
11712  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'CommandeFournisseur') {
11713  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."commande_fournisseur as o";
11714  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Product') {
11715  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product as o";
11716  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Ticket') {
11717  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."ticket as o";
11718  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'BOM') {
11719  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."bom_bom as o";
11720  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Contrat') {
11721  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."contrat as o";
11722  }
11723 
11724  $sql .= " WHERE a.entity IN (".getEntity('agenda').")";
11725  if ($force_filter_contact === false) {
11726  if (is_object($filterobj) && in_array(get_class($filterobj), array('Societe', 'Client', 'Fournisseur')) && $filterobj->id) {
11727  $sql .= " AND a.fk_soc = ".((int) $filterobj->id);
11728  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Project' && $filterobj->id) {
11729  $sql .= " AND a.fk_project = ".((int) $filterobj->id);
11730  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Adherent') {
11731  $sql .= " AND a.fk_element = m.rowid AND a.elementtype = 'member'";
11732  if ($filterobj->id) {
11733  $sql .= " AND a.fk_element = ".((int) $filterobj->id);
11734  }
11735  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'CommandeFournisseur') {
11736  $sql .= " AND a.fk_element = o.rowid AND a.elementtype = 'order_supplier'";
11737  if ($filterobj->id) {
11738  $sql .= " AND a.fk_element = ".((int) $filterobj->id);
11739  }
11740  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Product') {
11741  $sql .= " AND a.fk_element = o.rowid AND a.elementtype = 'product'";
11742  if ($filterobj->id) {
11743  $sql .= " AND a.fk_element = ".((int) $filterobj->id);
11744  }
11745  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Ticket') {
11746  $sql .= " AND a.fk_element = o.rowid AND a.elementtype = 'ticket'";
11747  if ($filterobj->id) {
11748  $sql .= " AND a.fk_element = ".((int) $filterobj->id);
11749  }
11750  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'BOM') {
11751  $sql .= " AND a.fk_element = o.rowid AND a.elementtype = 'bom'";
11752  if ($filterobj->id) {
11753  $sql .= " AND a.fk_element = ".((int) $filterobj->id);
11754  }
11755  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Contrat') {
11756  $sql .= " AND a.fk_element = o.rowid AND a.elementtype = 'contract'";
11757  if ($filterobj->id) {
11758  $sql .= " AND a.fk_element = ".((int) $filterobj->id);
11759  }
11760  }
11761  }
11762 
11763  // Condition on actioncode
11764  if (!empty($actioncode)) {
11765  if (empty($conf->global->AGENDA_USE_EVENT_TYPE)) {
11766  if ($actioncode == 'AC_NON_AUTO') {
11767  $sql .= " AND c.type != 'systemauto'";
11768  } elseif ($actioncode == 'AC_ALL_AUTO') {
11769  $sql .= " AND c.type = 'systemauto'";
11770  } else {
11771  if ($actioncode == 'AC_OTH') {
11772  $sql .= " AND c.type != 'systemauto'";
11773  } elseif ($actioncode == 'AC_OTH_AUTO') {
11774  $sql .= " AND c.type = 'systemauto'";
11775  }
11776  }
11777  } else {
11778  if ($actioncode == 'AC_NON_AUTO') {
11779  $sql .= " AND c.type != 'systemauto'";
11780  } elseif ($actioncode == 'AC_ALL_AUTO') {
11781  $sql .= " AND c.type = 'systemauto'";
11782  } else {
11783  $sql .= " AND c.code = '".$db->escape($actioncode)."'";
11784  }
11785  }
11786  }
11787  if ($donetodo == 'todo') {
11788  $sql .= " AND ((a.percent >= 0 AND a.percent < 100) OR (a.percent = -1 AND a.datep > '".$db->idate($now)."'))";
11789  } elseif ($donetodo == 'done') {
11790  $sql .= " AND (a.percent = 100 OR (a.percent = -1 AND a.datep <= '".$db->idate($now)."'))";
11791  }
11792  if (is_array($filters) && $filters['search_agenda_label']) {
11793  $sql .= natural_search('a.label', $filters['search_agenda_label']);
11794  }
11795  }
11796 
11797  // Add also event from emailings. TODO This should be replaced by an automatic event ? May be it's too much for very large emailing.
11798  if (isModEnabled('mailing') && !empty($objcon->email)
11799  && (empty($actioncode) || $actioncode == 'AC_OTH_AUTO' || $actioncode == 'AC_EMAILING')) {
11800  $langs->load("mails");
11801 
11802  $sql2 = "SELECT m.rowid as id, m.titre as label, mc.date_envoi as dp, mc.date_envoi as dp2, '100' as percent, 'mailing' as type";
11803  $sql2 .= ", null as fk_element, '' as elementtype, null as contact_id";
11804  $sql2 .= ", 'AC_EMAILING' as acode, '' as alabel, '' as apicto";
11805  $sql2 .= ", u.rowid as user_id, u.login as user_login, u.photo as user_photo, u.firstname as user_firstname, u.lastname as user_lastname"; // User that valid action
11806  if (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Societe') {
11807  $sql2 .= ", '' as lastname, '' as firstname";
11808  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Adherent') {
11809  $sql2 .= ", '' as lastname, '' as firstname";
11810  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'CommandeFournisseur') {
11811  $sql2 .= ", '' as ref";
11812  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Product') {
11813  $sql2 .= ", '' as ref";
11814  } elseif (is_object($filterobj) && get_class($filterobj) == 'Ticket') {
11815  $sql2 .= ", '' as ref";
11816  }
11817  $sql2 .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."mailing as m, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."mailing_cibles as mc, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."user as u";
11818  $sql2 .= " WHERE mc.email = '".$db->escape($objcon->email)."'"; // Search is done on email.
11819  $sql2 .= " AND mc.statut = 1";
11820  $sql2 .= " AND u.rowid = m.fk_user_valid";
11821  $sql2 .= " AND mc.fk_mailing=m.rowid";
11822  }
11823 
11824  if (!empty($sql) && !empty($sql2)) {
11825  $sql = $sql." UNION ".$sql2;
11826  } elseif (empty($sql) && !empty($sql2)) {
11827  $sql = $sql2;
11828  }
11829 
11830  // TODO Add limit in nb of results
11831  if ($sql) { // May not be defined if module Agenda is not enabled and mailing module disabled too
11832  $sql .= $db->order($sortfield_new, $sortorder);
11833 
11834  dol_syslog("function.lib::show_actions_messaging", LOG_DEBUG);
11835  $resql = $db->query($sql);
11836  if ($resql) {
11837  $i = 0;
11838  $num = $db->num_rows($resql);
11839 
11840  while ($i < $num) {
11841  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
11842 
11843  if ($obj->type == 'action') {
11844  $contactaction = new ActionComm($db);
11845  $contactaction->id = $obj->id;
11846  $result = $contactaction->fetchResources();
11847  if ($result < 0) {
11848  dol_print_error($db);
11849  setEventMessage("actions.lib::show_actions_messaging Error fetch ressource", 'errors');
11850  }
11851 
11852  //if ($donetodo == 'todo') $sql.= " AND ((a.percent >= 0 AND a.percent < 100) OR (a.percent = -1 AND a.datep > '".$db->idate($now)."'))";
11853  //elseif ($donetodo == 'done') $sql.= " AND (a.percent = 100 OR (a.percent = -1 AND a.datep <= '".$db->idate($now)."'))";
11854  $tododone = '';
11855  if (($obj->percent >= 0 and $obj->percent < 100) || ($obj->percent == -1 && $obj->dp > $now)) {
11856  $tododone = 'todo';
11857  }
11858 
11859  $histo[$numaction] = array(
11860  'type'=>$obj->type,
11861  'tododone'=>$tododone,
11862  'id'=>$obj->id,
11863  'datestart'=>$db->jdate($obj->dp),
11864  'dateend'=>$db->jdate($obj->dp2),
11865  'note'=>$obj->label,
11866  'message'=>$obj->message,
11867  'percent'=>$obj->percent,
11868 
11869  'userid'=>$obj->user_id,
11870  'login'=>$obj->user_login,
11871  'userfirstname'=>$obj->user_firstname,
11872  'userlastname'=>$obj->user_lastname,
11873  'userphoto'=>$obj->user_photo,
11874 
11875  'contact_id'=>$obj->fk_contact,
11876  'socpeopleassigned' => $contactaction->socpeopleassigned,
11877  'lastname'=>$obj->lastname,
11878  'firstname'=>$obj->firstname,
11879  'fk_element'=>$obj->fk_element,
11880  'elementtype'=>$obj->elementtype,
11881  // Type of event
11882  'acode'=>$obj->acode,
11883  'alabel'=>$obj->alabel,
11884  'libelle'=>$obj->alabel, // deprecated
11885  'apicto'=>$obj->apicto
11886  );
11887  } else {
11888  $histo[$numaction] = array(
11889  'type'=>$obj->type,
11890  'tododone'=>'done',
11891  'id'=>$obj->id,
11892  'datestart'=>$db->jdate($obj->dp),
11893  'dateend'=>$db->jdate($obj->dp2),
11894  'note'=>$obj->label,
11895  'message'=>$obj->message,
11896  'percent'=>$obj->percent,
11897  'acode'=>$obj->acode,
11898 
11899  'userid'=>$obj->user_id,
11900  'login'=>$obj->user_login,
11901  'userfirstname'=>$obj->user_firstname,
11902  'userlastname'=>$obj->user_lastname,
11903  'userphoto'=>$obj->user_photo
11904  );
11905  }
11906 
11907  $numaction++;
11908  $i++;
11909  }
11910  } else {
11911  dol_print_error($db);
11912  }
11913  }
11914

11917

12072  }

12074  $late = 1;
12075  }

12077  $late = 1;
12078  }

12080  $late = 1;
12081  }
